name: Winding Road
summary: Winding Road is an arcade scoring game. Move along the winding road, change shape and collect points.

name: Windrush Tales
summary: Windrush Tales is an illustrated text-based narrative game exploring the courage, community and culture of a generation.

name: Wing Breakers
summary:
Wing Breakers is extreme battle air racing mayhem with crazy cows.
Survive chaotic air fights full of missile loaded planes, threatening drones and angry animals. Beat them all and become a hero of Wing Breakers!

name: Wild Shape
summary: Play as a Shapeshifter thrown into a battle between nature and machines

name: Winging It
summary: Experience the spring as a bluebird. Choose the material for your nest, feast on natureâ€™s bounty in the form of seeds, berries, and worms, and participate in quintessential bird activities. Most of all, take care of your eggs to make sure they hatch safe and sound. And, remember: donâ€™t give up!

name: Wild Child
summary: Have a relaxing time exploring a colorful island. Gather collectibles to befriend cute animals during a quiet journey.

name: Wild-Gun
summary:
This is a game with unique mechanics and atmosphere. It resembles old slot machines where you had to shoot a pistol in a game about the wild west.

The game calculates the movement of the phone in several ways:
- tilt the phone away from yourself down (shot)
- tilt the phone to the left (reload)
Before firing, you need to pull the trigger with your thumb. Thus, there is almost an imitation of a real weapon. 6 rounds in a revolver, all almost for real!

The game has 3 modes:
- Duel (you can fight against a friend or AI) Your task is to pull the trigger first and shoot at a certain moment. It would seem simple, but the atmosphere can get heated to the limit, and rustles and sounds around to confuse, because this is the Wild West, here you need to be alert to the end! Especially when your life and the honor of a real cowboy are at stake! Prove that you are the fastest in the Wild West!
- Saloon. Is there a real Wild West without a brawl at Saloon? Of course not! Shoot your enemies, throw dynamite at them and try not to miss the dexterous jumping cowboys. Play alone or with a friend, score points and compete!
- Chasing or robbing a train. Yes, you were not mistaken - a horse, a train, a robbery! The goal is to catch and rob the train in the shortest time. A real cowboy will never miss the opportunity to get a little rich. All that is needed is to shoot a dozen enemies, detach several carriages with the loot and at the end find the key to the main chest with gold coins! Try to do it faster than anyone!

name: Wild Marble Beats
summary: No controls, only your sound

name: With Your Mom's Tits
summary: With Your Mom's Tits is an Adventure RPG set in a vast fantasy world filled with various countries, towns, humans, animals, and monsters. Fight your way through a treacherous continent to rediscover the meaning of life â€” with the help of a cute magical dog!

name: Wizardry: New Age of Llylgamyn
summary: New Age of Llylgamyn is the second set of Wizardry remakes for the Playstation (Llylgamyn Saga was the first and encompassed the original trilogy). It consists of the classic and arrange versions of the notoriously hard Wizardry IV: The Return of Werdna as well as a remake of Wizardry V: Heart of Maelstrom. Sporting improved visuals, new orchestral soundtrack, auto-mapping, quick-saving and a nifty feature which allows the player to switch back to the wireframe graphics and 8-bit sprites, it is arguably the best way to enjoy these classic dungeon crawlers.

name: Wizard's Way Out
summary: A small puzzle game about getting out of big trouble! Trapped in a prison, a Wizard uses telekinesis to push and pull their way out and escape together with newfound friends!

name: Wiggly Pig
summary: Rage while wiggling around with this silly piggy

name: Winner vs. Loser
summary:
Winner vs. Loser is a two-player, one-button athletics game in the mold of â€˜Track â€˜N Fieldâ€™. Press your button rhythmically to build up speed, and hold it down to jump the hurdles.

I wrote this for Kokoromiâ€™s Gamma 4 event, which called for games that could be played with one button, but they didnâ€™t go for it. Maybe if I had pressed my button more rhythmicallyâ€¦

A training mode is included for people with no friends, but really itâ€™s designed to be played with one or more people standing by.

name: Windstone
summary: Survive in a land ravaged by an invasive species. You and your dragon are Windstone's last hope.

name: Wizards of Alamar
summary: Wizards of Alamar! Imagine if Zelda hooked up with Metroid and D&D then had a crazy love child! Yeah it is that good!

name: Wizsnooks
summary: Are you ready for the hottest entertainment in this side of the world of wizards?

name: Winter Magic
summary: a lonely girl moves into a witch town and meets a cool witch~

name: Wild Heart
summary: An animal-based tactics game.

name: Wintersdawn in the Deep
summary: Help young Quinlan complete his patrol in the dangerous forests of the Western Deep in this short adventure game!

name: Wintersands
summary: Take charge of your life and save the magic world from ruin as the Keeper of Fire

name: With Seven Cats
summary: Walls are closing in.

name: Within the Threes
summary: A Maze Puzzle In The Woods

name: Wish I Could Dive
summary: Wish I Could Dive is an action-casual game where you control a little bird that pretends to be a fish.

name: Wire Wood Daughters
summary: "Wire Wood Daughters" is a beautiful, 16 bit narrative game. Follow the forest's memory through this female protaganist fantasy story.

name: Wired to the Moon
summary: Drive the elevator to the moon before your oxygen runs out!

name: Wizard Graph
summary: Directed Graph, Turn Based Combat

name: Within Her HeArt
summary: A Magical Girl RPG short story! Tama has a painting in the art show, but strong feelings may be hiding within.

name: Wildland: Initial Attack
summary: Stamp out fires with your friends using planes, helicopters, and your hands in a huge beautiful world. Customize your character. Play online or LAN. Save towns, people, animals, and the forest. Build your base to get better tools and vehicles. Jump into the fiery abyss as a smokejumper and see if you can survive!

name: Witch Sequencer
summary: Witch Sequencer is an adult transformation puzzle game. It tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to complete the protagonist's infernal transformation.

name: Wibble Wobble Multiplayer
summary:
It's a wibbly wobbly world for four friends.

Collect stars to boost your score multiplier, jump on top of dead players to revive them, avoid hazards, stay alive and get a high score.

name: Witch Explorer
summary:
Witch Explorer is a game which features a mix of both shoot 'em up and tower defense gameplay.
You play as the witch Tia, who is on a teasure-hunt in order to remove her debt and improve her magic shop.
The goal of the game is to defeat waves of monsters by both strategically placing units on the map, and by flying around on the map while shooting and dodging projectiles and enemies yourself.

name: Wizard's Adventure
summary: As a wizard, you are pretty powerful and also have a pretty powerful apatite! This game takes you on an adventure from a dark dungeon, to a lush forest, to a brisk and beautiful mountain top!

name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship
summary: Based on the successful Windstorm movies and best-selling books, experience exciting riding tasks together with Windstorm and freely explore the breathtaking surroundings of the Kaltenbach estate. Ride alongside other horses, look for hidden objects and try to become the racing champion. Numerous secrets and hidden locations are waiting to be discovered! After a long day of adventuring across the beautiful hills of Kaltenbach, take care of your animal friend with all of your love! Grooming, scraping out hooves and much more is necessary to keep your newly made friend in good shape.

name: Wild & Adventure Pinball
summary: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Wicked Rider
summary: Wicked rider is a retro motorcycle racing game, with a similar style to 'outrun', 'lotus' and 'crazy cars' series in Amiga/DOS. There are 15 tracks, betting rivals and upgrades. Well, that's pretty much it.

name: Wild West
summary: WILD WEST - is a hardcore 3D shooter with survival elements where you will have to fight various enemies playing as a sheriff James.

name: Win by Definition
summary:
"Win by Definition" is a one-player card game adventure. Run the card which has the effect "win" below, or that's all.
You will be born as a role of a subspace in a world where nothing should have existed
and explore for what you are.

name: Windfolk: Sky Is Just the Beginning
summary: Test your flying skills. Become the fastest person in Eurian and don't let the enemies stop you. Use barrel rolls and acrobatic movements to fly as fast as you can. Battle in a unique environment where you have to keep moving in order to dodge the enemies' attacks. Combine your weapons and skills to create unique effects that will help you defeat your enemies. From the tropical seaside with floating islands to the scorching deserts that hold the ruins of an ancient civilization, discover the wonderful world of Eurian. Go behind enemy lines and explore every corner of each stage.

name: Wing Pilot
summary:
Wing Pilot is an arcade style aerial combat shooter.
You take on the role of a fighter jet pilot battling enemy aircrafts.

name: Winter With You
summary: Naoki was really excited about spending Christmas with his beloved. But those plans weren't meant to be - Naoki saw her hugging another guy. Christmas seems ruined but just one random encounter can change everything. This is a Japanese-style kinetic visual novel about the Christmas.

name: Within Skerry
summary: The Accumulation of Evil is an ancient book stating that if enough evil energy is concentrated in a single area, a dark force may be born.Humans can sometimes be very horrible creatures - but sometimes, it is taken a bit too far.

name: With You
summary: With You is a cooperative two-player puzzle-playground. It's a playful space that hopes to inspire couples to connect, communicate, and collaborate.

name: Windmills
summary: Master your combat techniques and explore a magic world in this combat - focused metroidvania. Help the unreliable narrator complete his story which changes depending on the player's actions.

name: Winter Grae
summary: Interactive FMV thriller Game that puts you inside a conspiracy to hide the truth. Hackers provide you access to deleted videos to explore an occult mystery. Unravel a coverup, look for clues to what happened to Winter Grae. Will you survive to tell the truth?

name: Witherholme
summary: Witherholme is a co-op (1-4 player) survival horror game where players take on the role of a young goblin magi. Scavenge for clues, discover new spells, and use your trusty staff to light the way through a cursed village.

name: Wintertwined
summary: When Winter and Giles find themselves stuck in a cabin during a snowstorm, they discover it's horrific history.

name: Willage
summary: An interactive series, where the player meets Eastern European culture.

name: Wind of Life
summary: The game is about the wind and its freedom. Make your way to a colorful and meditative journey. Go all the path escaping the dangers of an abandoned planet and controlling the wind power.

name: Wizard Girl Anzu

One day, this mob character develops personality and suddenly realizes everyone around him is an "NPC", characters without any kind of willpower.

name: Witchbane
summary: Witchbane is a retro-styled 2D action platformer where you must use your skills and weapons to defeat the evil brought unto the world by witches. Work your way through each distinct level and defeat the witch who controls the horde of monsters in that area to end the blight placed upon the land.

name: Wilderplace
summary: Wilderplace is a puzzle-adventure game set within the Divine Garden, an idyllic creation of the gods that has plunged into chaos and conflict. You play as a shaman, tasked with restoring order through your magical abilities. Explore the maze-like environment, harness magical artifacts, and uncover mysteries as you wrangle restless spirits and evade dangerous intruders.

name: Wild Dogs
summary: The world is under a frantic alien attack. Amidst the chaos and with the army virtually subdued, the deadliest and most inconsequential pair of specialists are called upon to do what must be done. Join the war hunting aliens around the world and in every way possible.

name: Wingsuit Dream
summary: One day, you have dreamt about fly the sky in there you feel free to fly A simple game about scoring, avoid and fly!

name: Witch Slide
summary: Witch Slide is a free to play, co-operative (1-4 players), sliding and dodging game where you leave your village with great haste to find what has corrupted the nearby forest. Together with your friends you must find your way through puzzles and escape danger.

name: Winter and People
summary: The cold is brutal. To protect your people and yourself, you must fight both the cold and your enemies. You will never die to the cold nor your enemies. You will resist, for your people and for yourself. Winter and People is a survival/tower defense game.

name: Witch and Council

Your small choices will make great changes every moment. We invite you to the witch world full of diverse characters and interesting scenarios.

name: Wizard time!
summary: It's â€Wizard time!â€ â€“ hardcore platformer with puzzle elements. Use different spell books and your skills to complete levels!

name: Wicked Paradise
summary: Wicked Paradise is a point and click visual novel, with mysterious and naughty story.

name: Witch Sacrifice
summary: Witch Sacrifice - you have to defend your lands from three cruel kings. A huge army is advancing on your swamps, which you have to stop.

name: Willian the Game
summary: Willian invites you on an action-packed journey through his entire football career. Experience all of the teams and countries where heâ€™s played, and donâ€™t forget to check out his amazing hairstyles along the way. Mixed with elements of fantasy and humor, this game is designed for all ages, and will entertain you from start to finish. Put your skills to the test as you score goals and ultimately become a football champion!

name: Wing Fighter
summary:
Wing Fighter is an free classic arcade online shooting game, with epic 3D realistic scene, gorgeous and fascinating combat effects and variety of unique bosses and equipment. If you loved arcade shooting games as a kid, this retro, vintage game blend modern combat styles would be the perfect game for you!

In every battle of Wing Fighter, You will become an air force pilot, controlling different fighters to fight evil enemies and bosses. It is your mission to defeat them and protect the safety and freedom of the skiesï¼Enemies have invaded, the battle is on the verge of breaking out, come on and start this thrilling combat flight action game now!

name: Winning Post 7 2010
summary: Winning Post 7 2010 is a Sports game, developed and published by Koei Tecmo Games, which was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Within
summary: Within is a narrative-driven adventure mobile game for you to explore your inner self. We call for those who are fans of mobile games containing exploration and murky forlorn atmospheres to come follow Emmaâ€™s footsteps into this desolate fairytale world. Awaken your past secrets and retrieve the very definition of oneself.

name: Wiztern
summary: Wiztern is one of the games built-in on the GP2X Wiz portable console.

name: Winter
summary: Face mythical creatures from ancient mythologies face to face, create an army and fight back before winter swallows you.

name: WikiArena
summary: WikiArena is a trivia game where players guess which of two random Wikipedia articles is either longer or gets more views. The game's main "arena" mode is run-based and asks players to get 10 correct guesses before being wrong 3 times.

name: Witch's Tales

However, after discovering that Circe is going to turn all of the famous princes into frogs until one of them marries her, Alice turns against the witch. Now she needs to break the curse, cast upon princes and restore peace in kingdom.

name: Winter's Wish: Spirits of Edo
summary: A fantasy set in historical Japan in the spirit of the first localized console otome game, Hakuoki: Demon of the Fleeting Blossom. A moving, emotional tale with gorgeous visuals and multiple endings to discover. Choose from one of three different Oniwaban divisions for the heroine to join and get to know her colleagues. Be careful â€” they may not all be human!

name: Wild West Gringos
summary: Classic Western Shootout Duel - One-on-One. Polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon ... and losing is not an option.

name: Wish of Abyss Dungeon
summary: A real-time strategy to explore the dungeon.

name: Wind Angel III
summary: "Wind Angel â…¢" is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Wind Angel Challenge
summary: Wind Angel Challenge is a vertical scrolling flight shooting game. The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the universe.

name: Wizard Mike
summary: Darkness came over the magical kingdom. The most powerful wizards stood against evil forces. But the enemy was too strong. The battle was lost.

name: Winter and People
summary: Winter and People mix tower defense and city building genres with its minimal style; It is a tower defense game where you try to survive in cold cities.

name: Wild Adventures
summary: Wild Adventures - is the simplest 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do different hardcore levels playing as a sheriff living in the Wild West.

name: Wire
summary: An obsession with her mortality puts Carissa into a morbid, downward spiral for she believes her unreasonable actions will prevent a death she obscurely dreamt about when she was a child.

name: Wild Earth: Africa
summary: The game is a first-person 3D simulation. Photo assignments include a family of elephants, a nighttime photo shoot of a pride of lions, and a helicopter ride across the Ngorongoro crater.

name: Winter Wonderland
summary: The winter holidays are here but when Alexa finds herself alone after her family is stuck when travelling to Paradise Cove, she is forced to go out and try and find some friends in town to spend the holiday with... But something seems strange.. is the day repeating itself?

name: Wish
summary: Soma, driven by destiny, begins his quest to save his home, Israfil Continent, which trembles in fear of an evil empressâ€¦ Elf Pontifex, princess knight, the first vampire, etc , with the many beautiful women waiting for their stories to unravel, what will happen in the end of this adventure...?

name: Winter's Fury
summary:
Winter's Fury is a partial conversion of twelve levels for Doom II and GZDoom by Pyroscourge. It was released on December 7, 2012, days before it was named a winner at the 19th Annual Cacowards. The levels are based around a frozen theme, and the WAD's story is highly significant to the overall experience.

Winter's Fury takes place in Siberia, in the year 2033, some time after the events of Doom II.

name: Wish Talk
summary: Set on a mysterious magical island, you will befriend toy characters through free-form chatting conversations powered by a cutting-edge deep learning AI. Help your new friends out, and guide them through their journey of growth and discovery!

name: Wildfox Surfing Paradise
summary: Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island. By doing stunts for a surfing magazine you are able to earn money and buy new surfboards, which allow for even wilder stunts and open up new areas of the game's open world.

name: Wicked Dolls

name: With Good Intentions

Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.

name: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
summary: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

name: Wingspan: European Expansion
summary: The Golden Geek Awards-winning expansion to Wingspan, a beautiful, relaxing board game for 1-5 players. Enjoy original gameplay features and attract new extraordinary birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

name: Wish World
summary: Leap into the world of Wish, a unique plane of existence filled with adventure and action! Around the world of Wish, the world is unfinished and must be restored, Jump into the past and future using dimensional doors! Do you have what it takes to save the world!

name: Wicked World #1
summary:
You lead a band of adventurers into the deep dungeon.
This is not easy turn-based RPG.

name: Wizard is Rolling
summary: Pick your skills and roll 4 wizard dices. If the dice combination matches, you will cast extraordinary magic spells. Let's roll for an epic adventure. More than 70 skills with different dice combination. Build your mighty wizard to fight against more than 70 unique monsters.

name: Windswept
summary: Our feather-shelled heroes were swept away by a storm, and they need your help! In this '90s-inspired platforming adventure, take on over forty handcrafted stages to discover the secrets of their world, the moon and beyond!

name: Wibble
summary: A challenging, silly, physics-based arcade game. Help Wibble get to the other side!

name: Williams Arcade Classics
summary: A port of Williams Arcade Classics for the Game.com that includes the Arcade games: Robotron: 2084, Joust, Sinistar, Defender and Defender II.

name: Wika Wicked's Egg
summary: Dare to be Queen Wika's courier in Wika Wicked's Egg; the most dangerous side-scrolling platform adventure in all the fairy lands. Can you, the mere fairykin sprite Lil' Sebastien, bring her this precious, fragile egg before the forces of darkness overwhelm the land & seal her kingdom forever?

name: Wild Indigo Ranch
summary: Wild Indigo Ranch is a cozy cowboy-life RPG for 1-4 players. Start a new life on the prairie, explore the frontier, build the finest ranch in the West, and ride into the sunset.

name: WildSnake
summary: WildSnake was an interesting take on the Tetris concept whereby players had to guide downwards different sized snakes to make lines. These incoming snakes could be twisted into any shape you desired, therefore eliminating those tricky gaps you always ended up with in Tetris - as long as you could control the slippery slithering blocks.

name: Wing Commander IV: The Price of Freedom
summary: Wing Commander 4 is one of the greatest space sims of all time, and some even consider it the greatest one of all. It is one of those games that did everything right. This is one of the few games that actually successfully manages to integrate a lot of FMV into the action, mostly because it uses trained film actors and directors. The combat is straightforward, fluid, and entertaining. The characters are as believable and memorable as they come. The orchestrated music -- just perfect. Finally, its enthralling story is both deep and plausible -- a combination that is often lost in modern games. There is simply no reason not to play this game and, once you do start playing, you will find it hard to think of a reason why you should stop.

name: Wingspan + European Expansion
summary: Immerse yourself in a relaxing, serene world of unusual birds from two continents and expand your wildlife preserves.

name: Will o' Wisp
summary: Will O' Wisp is an otome game, developed and published by Otomate, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Wild Wolf Simulator 3D
summary:
Have you ever imagined being wild Wolf? Now you can play as real wild Wolf and become the most powerful animal in the wilderness.
Be a wild Wolf and survive in the wildness as long as you can. Start your own pride of wolves, fight for your life against fierce animals like moose, bear and fox. Evolve your Wolf to become the strongest Wolf ever.

name: Will o'Wisp: Easter no Kiseki
summary: A fandisc set one year after the events of Will o' Wisp.

name: Will o' Wisp Portable
summary: A bundle of both Will Oâ€™ Wisp games, with new additional content.

name: WingedStar: Descent
summary: Inspired by retro platformers, WingedStar: Descent is a challenging 2.5D action platformer in which the player controls a warrior tasked with defeating demons that have gained control of the world below. Descend and reclaim the land for your peaceful subjects.

name: Wildfrost
summary: Take on the elements in Wildfrost, a tactical roguelike deckbuilder! Journey across a frozen tundra, collecting cards strong enough to banish the eternal winterâ€¦

name: Winx Club
summary: Join the Winx Club and prepare for an interactive adventure of fairies, fantasy, fashion and magic! Take on the role of Bloom, a 16 year-old Earth girl, who discovers she is a magical fairy! Meet Bloom's fairy friends, Stella, Flora, Tecna and Musa and battle with them against the evil witches in this most exciting girls adventure ever! Featuring a wide range of community-based activities and collectibles, The Winx Club will whisk you away on an unforgettable adventure!

name: Winning Post 9: 2022
summary: A new system called Yushun no Kizuna, represents a bond between horses.

name: Witch on the Holy Night
summary: Set in 1980s Japan, Witch on the Holy Night tells the story of fan-favorite Type-Moon character Aoko Aozaki as she attempts to navigate the complex world of magecraft while also dealing with the everyday struggles of life as a high school student! Players will experience the thrilling origin story of this much-beloved character, penned by Kinoko Nasu, famed creator of the Fate series, himself.

name: Witches' Legacy: Lair of the Witch Queen & Witches' Legacy: Hunter and the Hunted
Wild Wild West: The Steel Assassin
Witch Strandings
summary: Witch Strandings dials into the emerging genre of physical transportation. A digital forest that extends beyond the boundaries of your screen, in an all-new Strand-type game.

name: Winter Tramp
summary: Winter tramp - A story about a tramp who has to overcome many trials, pain and mysteries on his difficult path. The next 40 kilometers are filled with robbers and wild animals.

name: Witches Legacy: Slumbering Darkness & Dark Throne
Wing
summary: In "Wing", you play as a fledgeling who fell from the nest, learning to fly as you climb back up to the sky.

name: Wizardish
summary: A first-person grid-based oldschool mini dungeon crawler inspired by Wizardry/Ultima, created in PICO-8.

name: Witches and Stitches
summary: A 7k word Twine game about working retail and dealing with magic managers who hate each other. So, a normal shift.

name: Within the Walls
summary: You're lost in a dark and strange place that defies logic, what makes it worse is that you're followed and preyed upon by unknown forces. Find your way through the catacombs of this horror text adventure as you struggle to survive with your life and your sanity intact.

name: Witch on the Holy Night: Limited Edition
summary: Witch on the Holy Night: Limited Edition includes the game, a special illustrated box, and an artbook.

name: Witch Epoch
summary: Witch Epoch is a game about a Witch fighting in the otherworld with various monsters that are getting stronger every time, collecting colored bonuses the player can cause damage and if the color of the bonus matches the color of the monster's weakness, then he will receive maximum damage!

name: Wings 1941
summary:
Experience the thrills of the 10 most famous battles of World War 2 in this retro voxel shooter. Guide your aircraft through a hail of bullets and enemy planes, ships and tanks.

Upgrade your aircraft and take on the most epic bosses such as the Yamato Battleship, the great Zeppelin, the fearsome Tiger Tank and many more!
General Brandon will guide you through each mission. Do you have what it takes to beat the 10 epic campaigns like Battle of Midway, D-Day, Stalingrad, El Alamein and more!

name: WipeOuters
summary: A first-person horror game with action elements where you and your friends must "wipe" the houses finding all the infected in the area before they find you.

name: Withering Rooms
summary: Withering Rooms is a 2.5D horror adventure set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Sneak through Mostyn House to gather weapons, distractions, magical artifacts, keys, and crafting materials.

name: Will This Bitter Night Bring Change?
summary: Follow Hornet and Emily in their attempt to escape the City, in all its neon glory.

name: Wildmender
summary: Unearth the past to protect the future. In Wildmender, you face the challenge of restoring the environment. Explore the landscape, revive withering plant life, cultivate your garden, and build a better world alone or with friends in 4-player online co-op.

name: Wild Forest
summary: Wild Forest, a mobile real-time strategy game with player-versus-player (PvP) battles and captivating card-collecting elements. Players can experience the feel of old-school RTS games while immersing themselves in fast-paced battles characterized by base building, macroeconomic resource management, and direct micro-control of individual units.

name: Winshu
summary: Winshu is a 4 v 4 bright colorful multiplayer game that has Chinese mythological creatures based on (Chinese guardian lions, aka lion dogs aka foo dogs). These lions have elemental powers such as fire, water, wood, metal and earth.

name: Wife Quest: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Wife Quest Collector's Box
- Wife Quest Game (region free)
- Wife Quest Manual
- Wife Quest Original Soundtrack CD
- Wife Quest Numbered Certificate

name: Wild Arms
summary:
Experience Wild Arms originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

A warrior, a princess and a rogue cross the wastelands of Filgaia on a quest for ancient relics that may save this brave new world â€“ a world where legends become reality. Join Jack van Burace, Princess Cecilia and Rudy Roughnight as they heed the call of the mythic Guardians to defend the lands from the evil Metal Demons.

With a story that spans centuries, breathtaking combat arenas and fully customizable options, Wild Arms launched on PlayStation in Japan in 1996, and now you can relive the original role-playing adventure that spawned a much-loved series.

name: Win a Million: The Ultimate Quiz Game
Winter Survival
summary: Winter Survival is a story-driven survival game where trauma turns reality into a reflection of your breaking mind. Battle cold, hunger, hallucinations, and adapt to the wilderness as it adapts to you.

name: Winter Things
summary: Winter Things is a 3D "find and click" puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the winter town location within a certain time. Only the most curious, patient and sharp-sighted will be able to finish this game!

name: Witchhazel Woods
summary: Your dog has been kidnapped by a lonely ghost! To save her, you must go on a journey through the woods, helping the creatures you meet along the way.

name: Witness of the Night
summary: Survive the night in an old observatory, helping your friend find the sources of mysterious radiation from outer space.

name: Win the White House
summary: Do you have what it takes? Run your own presidential campaign to find out.

name: WitchSpring3
summary: The story of a witch who is chased after by warriors.

name: Wits of Gods
summary: Wits of Gods is a multiplayer turn-based strategy card game. The game uses a shared deck and you do NOT need to build a deck. The rules are simple. Play your hand during your turn to operate your deity and up to 3 pets. We recommend that you start with a 2V2 mode (2 players vs 2 players).

name: Windsor
summary: Windsor is a massively multiplayer strategy game. Look forward or backward in time as you plan your moves to bring your kingdom to victory

name: Witch Hunt
summary: A fantasy adventure RPG with 9 playable characters

name: WitchSpring R
summary:
WitchSpring R is a story-based RPG that combines elements of training, collecting, and exploring. It is a remake of the 2015 mobile title WitchSpring.

Outside, you can enjoy collecting magical ingredients, fighting against warriors and monsters, and developing stories with various characters.
At home, you can enjoy training your own witch by scheduling training, and fusing magic ingredients that can be collected from the field.

The witch's ending is enriched by the player's choice and the witch's growth.

name: Witchcraft
summary: In Witchcraft you will be able to create your own character configuration and fight against your friends, or AI, in 1vs.1 or 2vs.2 battles. The way you customize your character and the way you manage yourself in the battlefield, will have huge consequences in leading you to victory or defeat.

name: Winter Games 2023
summary: Winter Games 2023 is an exciting sports game in a modern 3D guise. The player can prove his/her athletic abilities in ten dynamic winter sports disciplines, for example, ski jumping, biathlon, ski cross, skeleton, or super-G. Set off on the hunt for records, best times, and trophies. Besides the individual disciplines there are also ready-to-play cups to choose from in which several disciplines can be played one after the other, and customized competitions you can put together yourself. Play alone against AI or compete in local multiplayer mode against up to three friends in an exciting winter sports duel.

name: Witchcraft: The Lotus Elixir
summary: Are you ready to meet your fate? Embark on an uncanny adventure as the Witch Apprentice in Witchcraft â€“ The Lotus Elixir, a hidden object adventure that calls out your buried talents and magic.

name: Wilderness Game Stalker VR: North America
summary: Stalk and hunt North Americaâ€™s most iconic game species in virtual reality through woodland, prairie, and lakeside vistas. Line up the perfect shot on a trophy buck, and experience the fear of becoming the hunted as dangerous predators turn the tables on unwary hunters.

name: Wizcave
summary: Take on the role of a magician and explore the mystery of underground caves. Fight monsters and try to recover the artifact from these caves, use your staff to summon spells. The road will not be restless, you will encounter many obstacles and enemies during your journey.

name: Wizardry School: Escape Room
summary: The School Headmaster needs your help to recover the Philosopher's Stone. In this escape room you will have to explore your wizardry school, solve puzzles, learn new spells and put your magical skills to the test. Will you save the school?

name: Wild West Builder
summary: Build the Old West towns and connect them with railroads! Explore the dead land of American desert and bring it to life. Build your own town from scratch- take care of your people, gather resources and expand the railroad network.

name: Wild Delivery
summary: The old-style-cooking-simulator-delivery game!

name: Wizard Man
summary: It's Wizard Man versus the powerful leaders and fighting forces of the world! An epic fantasy land awaits, full of ferocious monsters conjured by an evil warlock through wrongfully performed experiments with dark magic. Will he succeed? You're in control!

name: Witch Girl Got Killed
summary: Witch Girl Got Killed is a first-person fantasy horror action game. You are a magical girl trainee. Use magic and destroy the labyrinth while running away from monsters.

name: Wicked Games
summary: To get a "Ticket to Paradise" while being in Hell. A ticket thatâ€™s obviously worth it. A ticket that sends you to the obstacle path. What kind of road from Hell to Heaven could it be? What difficulties are awaiting you on this road? Are you worthy of a chance at redemption?

name: Wings of Glory
summary: Rule the skies in strategy dogfights in the digital adaptation of the classic tabletop board game!

name: Wikitrivia
summary: Wikitrivia is a trivia browser game created by Tom J. Watson, which gained popularity in January 2022. Players are presented with a timeline and a card with a subject and a type of date, and must put the event in the correct place in the timeline.

name: Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist
summary: Introducing the first ever simulation game where you can manage game animals on your properties, and boost their genetics by buying better quality animals to breed with your herd. Try to maintain a decent population while protecting them from natural predators.

name: Wiz Mud
summary: An abandoned MUD (Multi User Dimension), unearthed by hackers in the year 2017 where you play as a wizard in a once lively MMO world. The new tenants of WizMud have taken to tossing priceless artifacts (old junk) from this forgotten MMO into the fishing pond, along with its conventions.

name: Wizarre
summary: Wizarre is a turn-based multiplayer game. Build and customize your team of Wizards, select from over 100 different spells, and manage your time and mana. Play with friends, compete against other players, and climb the global leaderboard across devices with crossplay support.

name: Without End
summary: Without End is a story heavy, turn based, experimental RPG, following the every day life of a high schooler.

name: Winky the Little Bear
summary:
Winky the Little Bear is a single player game aimed at younger children. There is a big storm in the forest. Teddy and Mi are swept up into the air and land in a very high tree and get stuck in it's branches. Their friends come to rescue them but can they succeed?

The game consists of a a Dingo Pictures animated film titled Winkie der kleine BÃ¤r, six paintings that can be coloured in and six scenes that can be turned into sliding block puzzles

The game was later released on the PlayStation 2 as Countryside Bears. It's the same game as the PlayStation version but adds a jigsaw puzzle mode and a pair matching mini game.

name: Windsurfing MMX
summary: The development team of â€Windsurfing The Gameâ€ worked on providing a close-to-reality simulation of windsurfing. The aim is to provide as much as possible of the fun and excitement this sport gives.

name: Wieldo
summary: Wield your sword and your creativity to survive in this procedural world. Fight to build. Build to fight. Bring some friends and make it home

name: Witch College Bundle
summary: Can you reveal the secrets of the elusive Sunflower Witch?

name: Wile E's Revenge
summary: Wile E's Revenge was the sequel to Road Runner's Death Valley Rally. In this game, you took the role of Wile E Coyote, and chased the Road Runner through various locations in the United States.

name: Wild West Story: The Beginnings
summary: Join Bella and Coyote Cub on their amazing journey to help rebuild their hometown in this exciting Wild West themed game! Use your Match 3 skills, awesome powerups, and quick wits to repair all the buildings and get people to move back into your town! Work your way through awesome Hidden Object scenes and save the gorgeous town!

name: Winter's Ankh
summary: A medieval CRpg with multiple storylines, kingdom building and romance.

name: Windmill Engine
summary: "Windmill Engine" is an incremental game where you need to build a windmill structure in a cartoon style of graphics.

name: Wild West
summary: Wild West is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will be told a story about the wild west and two lesbians who love to be intimate. One day they met and it started... The game is filled with adult scenes, humor and romance.

name: Without kidney
summary: Without kidney is a shooter metroidvania game with a hero who can hook like spiderman and jump with cannon explosions. Using a grappling hook, a cannon and other bonuses, that can be found on the way, you go forward to the main capitalist boss

name: Witch Story
summary: In a kingdom, there is a witch who lives off the beaten track. She is busy with alchemy, potion-making, fortune-telling ,frightening people and other magic..They say she has already lived for a few centuries here. The local lord is fed up with such neighbourhood...

name: Witch's Mystery
summary: This is a card game that can wake up your memory

name: Witch Schools: Love Potions
summary: Move, memorize and make 3 in a row.

name: Winterstrike
summary: A winter-locked city. Cold guns. Starship carcasses. And now, you.

name: Wizordum
summary: Wizordum is a retro-inspired FPS with a focus on action and light puzzles. It blends the best features of classic fantasy shooters from the 90s with some modern aspects making it a unique experience. Take the role of a Cleric and fight against Chaos that roams the land - smash, burn and loot!

name: Witch fly
summary: Try to see how many seconds you can survive!

name: WingMan
summary: WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, Itâ€™s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with ladies all around the world.

name: Wizards of Chaos
summary: Become the Wizard who brings Chaos and Destruction to the world of Evil before It gets you! Destroy and loot everything in this Action Roguelike RPG. Find Artifacts, learn spells and expand your game with every achievement. Control your Wizard with only your mouse or one stick.

name: Without Judgement
summary: Without Judgement is a third or first person open world action rpg. Set in the futuristic Florida, you are going to be able to freely explore the countless cities and settlements across the state. Experience engaging and dynamic quests and random encounters which can be solved in multiple ways.

name: Wispera
summary: Wispera is a procedurally generated, open-world sandbox survival game. Craft weapons to battle monsters at night, or expand your base and create a safe haven. If you prefer to remain mobile, travel away and explore new places. Whether youâ€™re a monster hunter or a builder, the choice is yours!

name: Winter Resort Simulator 2: Riedstein
summary: Just in time for the start of the winter season, a DLC will be released with a new game world, frequently requested features and no less than three new ropeways.

name: Wicked
summary: Wicked is a first person co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. They say something evil lives in the house. Explore the house with your friends and find out if the rumors are true.

name: Wicked Island
summary: Adult open world survival with sex defeat system, pregnancy, player building and much more. Combat horny monsters, build your home, craft your gear, customize your character and build pets! Fight your way trough dungeons, caves, and ruins across the map.

name: Wiener Wars
summary: After a horrific science accident in a secret world war 2 laboratory, all of humanity is ripped through space time only to be reintroduced as sentient wieners. The war still rages. How will we get out of this mess? Who knows? But we can only figure that out once weâ€™re doing killingâ€¦

name: Wild Lotus
summary: This work is a secondary creative game work with the theme of Oriental project. The game type is the survival sandbox class. Many players are online to collect all kinds of materials and improve their combat ability

name: Winery Simulator
summary: In the Winery Simulator, you will take control of an old and neglected vineyard. Through your work, it will regain its former glory.

name: Winged Raider
summary: Save the Kingdom of Daanco from the curse of Turkzu in Winged Raider! Unlock the story by progressing in this goofy roguelike 2D shooter. Fly around the Winged Castle, find new weapons, unlock abilities with colored wings, kill your enemies, and DIE?! Try not to die.

name: Wings of the Universe
summary: Wings of The Universe (WoTU) is a free-to-play 2D indie space action MMORPG top-down game developed by a single programmer. WoTU is designed to be co-op heavy, but even a lone wolf can survive with his skills and have fun.

name: Wingsuit Thrill
summary: Fly over beautiful landscapes to relax and enjoy the view. Or challenge yourself whenever you feel the need to spice up your flight. It's up to you!

name: Wildwood: Graveyard Defense
summary: In Wildwood, you play as a grave keeper living on the outskirts of Wildwood Forest. Your job is simple: scare away all the ghosts and defend your graveyard. The night is eternal - survive as long as possible.

name: Witch Hunter
summary:
This game is a porn parody of the animated series W. I. T. C. H. and you will better understand the plot and get more pleasure from the game if you are familiar with this universe.

Although in general, this is not necessary at all.

name: Wizardia
summary: Wizardia is a AAA-quality Play-to-Earn online role-playing strategy game with unique NFTs at its core. Itâ€™s built on three gameplay pillars: innovative turn-based combat, player-decision driven game evolution, upgrade-based character progression.

name: Wild Hearts
summary: Prepare for an epic adventure set in a fantasy world inspired by feudal Japan. Developed by Omega Force, the Japanese studio behind Dynasty Warriors, in partnership with Electronic Arts.

name: Wild Water Adrenaline featuring Salomon
summary:
Wild Water Adrenaline is a game based on whitewater kayaking and rafting. Up to four players, in single kayaks or controlling a raft together, can play simultaneously to go down rivers, conquer rapids and drop off cliffs. The player especially needs to pay attention to the steering, which is controlled through the analogue sticks, one for each of the character's arms, to avoid a variety of obstacles. This is done by constantly moving them in a circular motion.

Next to the main game modes, there is also a training to explore the course and get used to the handling. The game is endorsed and has been developed in collaboration with Salomon, a manufacturer of articles for outdoor sports.

name: Witch Guild Survivor
summary: Witch Guild Survivor is a fun horde roguelite game where you play as a witch that must survive from the monsters using your poweful spells! Collect white orbs and upgrade your magic spells. Choose a combination of various elements to generate synergies between them in each run

name: Wing Warriors
summary: Wing Warriors is a fast paced shoot â€˜em up, featuring three playable characters that promote different strategies as you try to conquer the gameâ€™s six stages and three boss battles. The game also features a score saving feature, and is playable in English, French, and Spanish.

name: Wishbone: Activity Zone
summary: Wishbone: Activity Zone is a game with some educational elements for children aged seven and up starring the dog Wishbone from the TV series. It contains ten activities and they are all started from central library that acts as a hub. The game contains for instance summaries for a number of classic novels and these are narrated by Wishbone. Similarly there is an activity where only the introduction of a famous story is provided and the player has to choose between different paragraphs to reconstruct the story in a logical way. The scrap book holds a collection of Wishbone photos for the player to browse.

name: Windstorm: An Unexpected Arrival
summary: After surviving a fire, Windstorm is restless and not even Mika is able to help him. It is only when the brave girl Ari unexpectedly arrives at the beautiful Kaltenbach estate that Windstorm is able to calm down by befriending Ari. Even though Ari has â€¦

name: Wireless Ms. Pac-Man
summary: Rerelease of Ms. Pac-Man with a wireless controller, and additional games New Rally-X and Bosconian.

name: Witch Amelia
summary: "Witch Amelia" is about Rody who dreaming of becoming a hero and his childhood friend Amelia went on an adventure together. Both believe that their relationship and this feeling of happiness will last forever.

name: Wife of My Boss
summary: When your boss is an asshole who ruins your life - it's time to take revenge and steal his wife!

name: Within the Backrooms
summary: You don't know how you got here, and you don't know how you'll leave. Wander the depths of the Backrooms in hopes of finding something more.

name: Wild Isles
summary: Wild Isles is a relaxing first person, nature walking simulator. Each Island is procedurally generated, and full of tranquil forests, stunning vistas, spectacular sunsets, and peaceful ocean waves. Lose yourself in the beauty and sounds of nature, explore the island and collect flowers.

name: WitchCraft TD
summary: Open the ancient portal and defend the crystal from waves of mysterious enemies! As an apprentice witch your magic is quite random so you have to come up with some strategy to make the best out of your luck.

name: Wizards, Knights & Archers
summary: Defend your townships Energy Orbs with your fellow AI helpers and your trusty pet against waves of invading fantasy creatures who home-in on your Orbs energy and want to take its power for themselves.

name: Win the Diamond
summary: Win The Diamond is a 3d side scroller action adventure sci-fi shooter game where there is a Diamond hidden somewhere in the level. The player needs to find the diamond and collect it, in order to win the diamond. But collecting it will not be an easy task.

name: Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007
summary: PSP port of Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007.

name: Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007
summary: The Xbox 360 port of Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007, featuring next-gen graphics and improved physics, altering gameplay.

name: Winning Eleven Tactics: European Club Soccer
Witch Potion
summary: Play mini games to gather magic ingredients, use the ingredients to make potions, then test them to see... Witch Potion is Which? You need to make a bird potion so you can fly to the party

name: Witch's Potion: Water Sort Puzzle
summary:
With an ultra-simple rule and control!
This is a puzzle game where you switch the water in the bottles to match the colors.
Seems easy but hard? Looks hard but easy!
A total of 1,000 brain-stimulating challenges for you.
Perfect for your spare time, but once you start, you can't stop!?

name: Witch & Lilies
summary: Witch & Lilies is a Girls Love RPG where players must pair up girls for both combat and romance as they venture through dungeons. Developed with scenario writer Kedoin Makoto (Corpse Party) and character designer magodesu (Space Patrol Luluco).

name: Witches Tavern
summary: Witch Tavern is a simulated business game that integrates tavern management, cosplay, love development and other elements. As the new boss of the witch tavern, you will meet all kinds of friends in this magical city of Venesia and start a full and extraordinary life.

name: Wild Castle
summary: Run away from snakes and rats, be quick to avoid traps , wild castle brings back the fun and charisma of retro platform games.

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Seasonal Decorative Pack
summary: This bundle includes: Wingspan Wingspan: European Expansion Wingspan: Seasonal Decorative Pack Wingspan is a relaxing, award-winning strategy card game about birds for 1 to 5 players. Each bird you play extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of â€¦

name: Witch Arcana
summary:
Welcome to the strange and beautiful world of Dwimmer...

... where universities of magic compete with each other to seal the monster-filled portals that open randomly throughout the land. At one such school arrives aspiring magician Gwendoline Harlowe, who quickly discovers there is much more to the Wakehollow Academy of Arcana than meets the eyeâ€¦

Grow your academy, battle vile monsters and rival schools, and join clubs to meet fellow magicians from around the world!

name: WinterThunder
summary: A Hex and Counter turn based World War 2 game. Turns are 2 days and hexes cover 6 miles or 10 kilometers. Punch a hole in the Allied line and use Strategic Movement to break through to Belgium.

name: Witches at Summer's End
summary: Summer is ending and nothing can last forever. The Admiralo Island Witches Club meets up for one last adventure before fall begins.

name: Witch Hat & Ears of Cat
summary: Lianna was a young Dark Magician who, after leaving her home village, moved to the city of Eastwall, capital of the frontier beween the world known to humans and the unexplored lands to the east, region known as the World's Edge. There, she would begin a new life with a new identity while following the instructions given by her Master.

name: Withering Rush
summary: Withering Rush is a 2d platform game made for ElRichMC for his 10 years on youtube

name: Willy Crash
summary: Detonate the TNT plunger to launch Willy Crash into a 3D cityscape. Aim for the tops of buildings to score big and watch Willy boogie down in a lively bonus celebration! Miss and he will hilariously crash into a number of cringe-worthy, interactive obstacles. Can losing be as much fun as winning? It just might be with Willy Crash!

name: Willy Crash Mini
summary: Experience the same gameplay of the original Willy Crash, just with a smaller cabinet and a 32â€³ screen. Willy Crash â€œMiniâ€ is more than one-and-a-half feet narrower, 10 inches shallower, and almost one foot shorter than the original version. The software and even the plunger are the same; maintaining the same player experience but allowing it to fit into even more locations!

name: Will There Bee Another?
summary: You are Bee, a girl that it's on an online date with Mel. The date is almost over, but Bee doesn't wanna end it... Can you find the correct words to delay this date a little more, or even get a second date?

name: Wingy
summary: Wingy is an adventure that takes shape in a vast open world that is fully explorable and rich in content. Engage in thrilling aerial battles, fight on the ground over floating islands and go beyond the borders of the known world to stop the war.

name: Witches and Butchers
summary: Witches and Butchers is a retro horizontal shoot-'em-up with RPG Elements. Control two characters at the same time, each one with their unique skills and roles, from a party that keeps getting bigger as you progress! Use the cooking system to enhance your character's skills and stats!

name: Wild Rumble
summary: Wild Rumble is a 3v3 roguelike soccer game in which you'll evolve your team as you score goals through dangerous arenas. Unlock new characters, master their abilities and pick the best upgrades to lead your team to victory!

name: Windhelm
summary: Soar into the unexplored world of Windhelm, an open-world fantasy RPG. Fly through the floating islands as you go on a mighty quest to defeat monsters, clear dungeons, and battle perilous enemies. Survive the harsh elements with nothing but your wits and craftable items.

name: Witchpunk

name: Wildshade Fantasy Horse Races
summary:
Have you heard of the Wildshade horses? Breed your dream horse with over 40 million options, equip each horse with matching tack, and prove that you are worthy of the legendary Wildshade herd. Win magical horse races in a fantastical, adventure-filled world!
Long ago, once a year near the village of Wildshade, something magical took place. A rainbow glow filled the sky, a sign that the wild horses of Wildshade had returned! Nobody knew where they came from or where they would return to. But one thing they did know for sure was that the horses were proud, brave, and worthy of respect. The villagers gathered for a race, each horse choosing their own rider. No sooner were they on the horse than each rider felt free, unbeatable.
And then, tragedy struck: the village and the surrounding area caught fire, the flames were unstoppable. The Wildshade horses never returned. The village was rebuilt and the people returned, the landscape recovered, but there was no sign of the horses.
The people in the village held horse races in memory of those beautiful wild beasts, trying to recapture those magical moments of the past when the horses would appear and the wild race began.
And now you, too can experience the magic of the Wildshade horses, thanks to Wildshade the game. There are plenty of wild horse races and beautiful, fantastic horses just waiting to meet you!

Don't worry: you've got a spell or two you can use against the monsters that lurk in the roughs.

name: Wizardry: Boukyaku no Isan
summary:
This is a sequel to "Wizardry: Seimei no Kusabi", released in November 2009.

There are three dungeons available, and the game added quality-of-life features to make it more user-friendly such as save points and fast travel.

Existing characters from the previous game have been removed, and players can create their own characters and form an original party from the beginning.

The game features various systems designed to enhance the fun of dungeon exploration, such as a real-time dungeon that uses the touch pen to solve various gimmicks, a "FAST mode" that cuts attack and spell effects and speeds up messages, a "cooperative attack" that can be activated by combining spells and active skills used during a turn, encounter monsters and adventure records, and a manual to check "achievements."

"Wizardry" is an RPG born in 1981 and is considered the originator of computer RPGs and a globally popular work. This game is a 3D dungeon RPG where players can enjoy labyrinth exploration by delving into deep dungeons. Please enjoy the adventure that follows the world view and system that are characteristic of "Wizardry" while incorporating unique gimmicks that are unique to the Nintendo DS.

name: Wildfire

name: Wizard's Watch

name: Witch Market
summary:
Beginning of a fairytale-like journey, Witch Market!
Run a witchâ€™s vending machine on the fantastical Greed Island!

name: Wireless Air 60
summary: The Wireless Air 60 is the successor to the Wireless 60. The console itself resembles Microsoft's Kinect device that comes with the Xbox 360 S consoles. Like the Kinect, the Wireless Air 60 uses your body instead of a physical controller to play games.

name: Wireless 60
summary:
The Wireless 60 Gaming System is a video game console developed by JungleTac in 2009, and can be seen as the predecessor to the Wireless Hunting Video Game System.

The console itself is a copy of Nintendo's Wii system, with two controllers that resemble Wii remotes. The controllers communicate with the console via infrared technology, which is the same technology used in television remote controls. The console appears to have "motion-sensing" technology of some sense, but it doesn't quite work properly.

As its name suggests, the console includes 60 games, which are all designed poorly and difficult to play. The games are split into two categories: sports, and arcade. A few of the games also recycle characters from old Disney movies.

Written on the box is also a note which reads, "If you're looking to purchase an Xbox, PlayStation, Wii, or equivalent, this product does not compare or compete with these technologies. The Wireless 60 is a family entertainment console, great for ages 5 and up."

name: Wireless Hunting Video Game System
summary:
Wireless Hunting Video Game System, also known as Wireless, is a plug and play console manufactured by Qi Sheng Long and distributed in the United States by Kids Station Toys in 2011.

The console itself utilizes a gun for the controller and comes with twenty games. The gun relies on a motion sensor on the front of the gun's barrel, which then communicates with either the console or a sensor which you can stick to the TV. Because of this, the gun is "wireless" as its name suggests, and uses four AA batteries held in a cartridge which stows in the back of the gun.

Two hundred years ago, the devil Medicis launched a war against humans because of the death of his beloved, the saint Lilith. ï¼Žï¼ŽThe leader of mankind, Arthur, the King of Light who personally executed the saint Lilith, raised his holy sword to resist for the survival of the world of light. The war caused by the love affair between Lilith, the Saint of Light, and the Demon Lord Medicis lasted for seven years. ï¼Žï¼Ž

The revenge war of the Demon King Medicis against the Holy King of Light was not successful. In the last battle of the Holy Demon Palace, the Holy King of Light Arthur defeated the Demon King Medicis with a sacrificed attack. In order to prevent all disasters, human beings at that time used the power of the absolute magic circle to seal all the dark people at the end of time and space.

You could say you were leading a normal life, but you always felt different from the rest. You returned from Canada to your hometown after Mom passed away. But everything changed radically the day you met Ceina, (ex) Queen of Heaven. What does your help ask to stop his sister, his counterpart, Satanichia. To do this, you must train and strengthen your powers in a very unique and erotic way. While you continue working in an exclusive Women's Academy, and caring for the little family you still have. Will you be able to fulfill your destiny? From protecting the people you care about? Which path will you choose?

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals - The Absence of Misericordia
summary:
It has been two years now, and the endless winter has not once relented, leaving many stranded in the settlement of Winternadir. The fur merchants come to the adventurers with a request...
The villagers often speak of a place of worship in the heart of a nearby valley. It was once home to "The Relic of Our Lady of Mercy", which was said to have kept the cold weather at bay. The relic is long since lost, and the valley has been abandoned. You must retrieve this relic, and return the region to its natural state.

name: With Mountain Smiling
summary: The Antarctic expedition in this game is still about extreme cold and darkness, but there is a guarantee of safe return, the danger is not so much constant as it is ever-present, and the new arrivals were not men.

name: Wildlife Hunter: Survival
summary:
Embark on an epic journey through diverse landscapes as you face the challenge of two exciting game modes: Level Mode and Survival Mode. In Level Mode, sharpen your hunting instincts and complete various tasks by taking down specific animal targets. Show off your marksmanship and strategic thinking as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

If you're up for the ultimate test of survival, then Survival Mode is for you. Brace yourself as waves of wild animals approach, each more aggressive than the last. Your goal is to withstand the onslaught and survive against all odds. Can you keep your cool and outsmart these cunning creatures?

name: Wickie und die starken MÃ¤nner: Die Mutprobe
summary: Vicky wants to join the vikings on their next journey but the crew think he isn't ready yet. To prove how strong Vicky is he needs to beat some of the vikings into challenges, but since he isn't the strongest he needs to come up with clever ideas to win.

name: Witch Trainer
summary: Miss Granger has become a headache for Professor Snapes, and next to this one you will try to "put in waist" to this one, developing not only his personal growth but also affecting other characters such as Snapes, Harry or Ginny, although these are only mentioned.â€‹

name: WingSuit Wiley 2.0
summary:
Join Wiley in the battle against pollution. The object of the game is to fly as far as you can as fast as you can to escape the evil dark cloud Mr. Pollution. Along the way you can use various power ups such as telekinesis, shield, double coin, coin magnet and wings which give you the ability to ram obstacles. When you ram obstacles or proximity fly it builds your focus meter. Proximity flying is the art of dodging an obstacle at the very last moment. When you focus it slows down time.
Join us as we fly through the streets of French Quarters in NOLA!
Super smooth animation!
Wiley says speed is the name of the game with his super cool wing suit!
Focus to improve your proximity flying!
Use telekinesis to clear your path!
Your speed power up will let you ram anything!
Enjoy our wonderful stereo sound track!
Please use headphones for best sound!
Don't forget, watch out for that ice cream truck!

name: Witchcraft Survivors
summary: Annihilate hordes of enemies in this thrilling, fast-paced action roguelite rpg and fill the screen with your magic. Kill your foes, become stronger each second and upgrade your characters with new spells and abilities. Can you survive the monsters that threaten your very existence?

name: Wish Us Luck
summary: Wish Us Luck is a multi-plot interactive fiction fueled by your hard decisions. Play three strangers whose fates are intertwined by the cogs of chance on an eventful day. But remember: favoring one character means jeopardizing the others.

name: With Eyes of Ice

name: Winnie's Hole
summary:
Join Winnie on a new adventure, from within!
Play as a virus in his body and mind. Capture cells to mutate and build a deck of actions to unleash in combo-driven combat.

A genre-blending roguelite with a dark yet charming story. Embrace discomfort - Sometimes we can't help being seen as a monster...

name: Wild West Pistolero
summary: In this arcade-inspired indie title you take on the role of bounty hunter Jules! Hunt legendary bandits of the Wild West, shoot your way through hordes of criminals, ride across the prairie and, of course, collect lots of money!

name: Witch's Heart: Bonus Stage
summary: Witchâ€™s Heart -Bonus Stage- is the continuation of Witchâ€™s Heart. Itâ€™s an adventure game by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment) made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, with some light action elements.

name: Window Garden

With a stunning cottagecore and lofi aesthetic, the game offers a peaceful and chill gaming experience as you build and maintain your own cozy grove with a variety of plants!

name: Witches X Warlocks: Lawrence's Route
summary:
This optional DLC comes with 40+ mini CG illustrations, one additional romance route (Lawrence) and 5 additional CGs in stunning HD.

Time to enhance the game with these eye candies and have a spooktacular Halloween with Witches x Warlocks!

name: Wind and Mist
summary: Wind and Mist "is a 3D free flying fairyland, role-playing real-time combat adventure game.The film level image quality brings a visual feast of national style. Come and enjoy this quiet time of cultivating immortals!

name: With All My Heart
summary:
This is a wee interactive experience made back in 2013 in Flash (R.I.P.) using Actionscript 3/appropriated sprites/sounds and vocal synth via UTAU. It was inspired by my memories as a lil kid playing the Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening on the Gameboy - specifically, Marin singing the Ballad of the Windfish in the village square.

<3

name: Wing Queen

name: Wipeout Dash 2
summary: Wipeout Dash 2 steps up the challenge with its brand new â€œswipe controlâ€ system to take on all new physics puzzles! Millions of gamers around the globe took on the challenges that the original Wipeout Dash had to offer but we ask â€¦ â€œAre you ready for more?â€ Wipeout Dash 2 has all new levels with all new challenges for you to come out swiping in all directions to see if you can be the ball â€¦ or Wipeout!

name: WildCraft
summary: Wildcraft: Embark on a Thrilling Journey of Online Survival Crafting Game that takes players on a captivating adventure in a vast and beautifully rendered 3D environment.

name: Within The Depths

name: Wild City
summary: Shape your urban ecosystem in Wild City, a unique roguelike deckbuilder! Rule a harmonious society or indulge in the citizens' primal instincts, as you shape your own concrete jungle!

name: Will You Wheel?

Engage in a variety of money-making activities such as woodcutting, nocturnal racing, or pizza delivery. Perhaps you're interested in managing a workshop for yourself? The possibilities are endless!

You've been chosen to return to your body 68 years after your death to save the souls of those who condemned you to a fate they now face.

name: Winnie-the-Pooh: Realm of Torment

name: William and Sly

name: Winnose

name: Wishbind

name: Wizavior
summary:
Wizavior is a single-player 3D platform game with rich 2D animations, in which the player visits different planets to save their inhabitants from imminent and unknown destruction.

Inspired by arcade games that had several levels and score accumulation, the player will travel across different planets collecting and managing their current resources, being able to secure themselves with lower scores or take risks for higher scores.

In the Stages, the Player must jump on rotating platforms collecting Crystals and return to a central platform to deposit them, powering up a Spell. The Spell must be kept energized for the duration of the stage, when a Portal is opened to save the aliens on that Planet. The player will visit different planets, each with their own mechanics and peculiar inhabitants.

name: Wild West Undead

Will players be able to defeat Morvagora and save the world from destruction? It depends on their skills, courage and determination!

name: Wild Mutation

In a harsh open-world environment filled with danger, craft tools,shelter and weapons, and survive while the war between humans and hybrids echos the wastelands.

name: Wild

name: WitchHand

Joined by a Knight-Errant and a Hedge-Witch, Izana will hack, slash, and shoot to release the island from the transformative grasp of sinister monsters.

What unique animal breeds will you discover and whom among the townsfolk will you befriend? Adventure awaits!

In this adventure, you take on the role of a determined owl working for a prestigious mail and parcel delivery service. Your aspiration is to become a personal owl for the main wizard.

Experience the story of Ari as she arrives in the Alpine area and quickly befriends Windstorm. Together they will go on exciting horse riding adventures and discover the true meaning of friendship!

summary: Wild Card Football is a fun pick-up-and-play arcade-style football game featuring 7v7 team-focused gameplay with the unique Wild Card system that lets you change the course of the action in an instant with special power-ups and rule-breaking abilities.

As you continue to gather, build, expand, and connect you will be able to turn your surviving settlement into a thriving town.

The place is the legendary island of Ginnugahar, which is a living territory, hungry for the life energy of anyone who dares set foot there and search for the relic. Watch your time over there, because the minute you enter the forest, its chronometer will start and until it stops, your life force will be sucked as it counts down. Finish the quest before time runs out or forever be part of that dreaded piece of land!

Lute with storage (+5 slots).
Decoration on the back.

Bard's hat (decoration).
Pet Inspiration, lighting the way.

The player can select one of 33 weapons, and the surroundings can be destroyed. The game includes multiplayer capabilities, either through linked PCs or two or more players using one keyboard plus gamepads/joysticks. In the original shareware version certain weapons were locked until the game was registered.

name: Wipeout

The other five answers are incorrect, and hitting a "Wipeout" loses all your money from the whole game (ouch). The two contestants with the most money at the end of round 1 go to play in the Wipeout Auction. From 12 options, players bid on how many correct answers they can pick out (up to the maximum of 8). Hitting a wipeout allows your opponent to steal the frame if they can find just one correct answer. Winning two frames gets you through to the final.

name: Wings of Seduction : Bust 'em out!
summary: Clothing damage + Survivor + Modified weapon. A girl is in danger! Rip her clothes off and save her! Get your mind out of the gutter and let's go because you are The One. Powerful weapons and outstanding skills- giving you an exceptional roguelike shoot-â€˜em-up experience each time!

name: Winged Gear
summary: Arena shooting game.

name: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
summary:
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a full 3D remake of the first game in the legendary Wizardry series of RPGs. It is built directly on top of the original 1981 game's code. Although it looks all new, underneath the hood is the authentic game. You can even view the original Apple II interface as you play.

While the well-known difficulty of the enemies has not been altered, quality-of-life improvements have been added in every area. Party management, navigation, spellcasting, and combat have all been significantly enhanced.

name: Wildlands Resurgence
summary: section for a game where players need to survive from both other players and wildlife, mine resources, craft items and structures, and even form tribes:

name: WizardryWars

The game is simple: You play as Wizards who have magical powers. Using your powers, you must kill all the other wizards and be the last wizard standing.

It is as simple as that
This was made for 2 hour challenge by the talented devs at Stux Group.
