summary: A hack and slash game set in a fantasy world where you take control of a fierce female protagonist to fight off waves of peasants and orcs. Break boxes and chairs over their heads. Make use of many weapons with unique move sets to leave a trail of blood and broken furniture.

name: Wizard with a Gun: Gunmancer Pack
summary: The Wizard With a Gun Gunmancer Pack includes the Dream Projector building recipe, Arch Wizard outfit, and Dandy outfit.

name: Wizardry: High School Exam
summary: Pass your magic exam with flying colors by surviving a final test within our dungeons. No worries, even though there may be numerous, highly resilient, and quite deadly exam golems, there is still time for you to excel, enhance your abilities, and learn a few new spells along the way.

name: Wishbound Desires
summary: Embark on a visually stunning 2D roguelike deck-building adventure set in a Japanese-inspired fantasy world. Strategically craft your card deck during battle, enhancing and personalizing the cards with powerful rewards, and embark on an enchanting journey filled with mysteries and romance.

name: Wild Seasons
summary: Wild Seasons is a roguelike, card battler where deck-building meets base-building. Cultivate a garden that grows mystical cards, orchestrate unique decks as your plants go in and out of season, and coordinate strategic plays across multiple turns to unleash wildly powerful combos!

name: Willy and Rosie: Bust Out of the Big House
summary: A rage quit platformer set in a cartoony world. Meet weird and funny characters as you throw yourself upward on the long journey to give your Ball and Chain the honeymoon she deserves.

name: Wicked Be The Ways of Men
summary: This map is different from most other maps in that the player progresses differently through the map depending on the skill level. Each skill level "starts" the map at a different location, and some of the traps are skill-level specific. Additionally, the keys and weapons are at different locations for the different skill levels, and there are some areas that are only accessible to specific skill levels.

name: Wings of Heroes
summary:
Wings of Heroes is a multiplayer mobile game set during World War 2.

Become a Pilot of realistic air combat! Team up with other plane pilots and become feared ace of the skies and a master of this action flight simulator!

Dogfight in WW2 planes! Select your planes from the most iconic models of the World War 2 fleet and try yourself in epic 5v5 air combat,
You can choose your strategy whether you prefer flying a warplane or a bomber, you have to remember that you won't pilot a modern jet.
In this World War 2 flight simulator, you'll have to pilot your plane and take part in sky combat from the last century.

Fly High! See you in the skies!

name: Witch's Bananas
summary: Witch's Bananas is a physics-based platformer where you collect a witch's lost banana collection by jumping around in during a time limit.

name: Wings of Redemption
summary: Wings of Redemption is rogue-lite top-down action game with focus on combining melee and ranged combat. Destroy hordes of monsters in randomly generated maps with variety of weapons on your way towards freedom.

name: Within Yourself
summary: In Within Yourself, you are to complete a total of three stages. You are given clues throughout the game on what to do next to progress.

name: WizardWars.Online
summary: WizardWars.online is a fast paced multiplayer game featuring strategic spell based combat. Players battle both NPCs and enemy players in short-lived matches. Progress your wizard, hone your skills, and team up with friends to win in the most magical battle royale title of 2024!

name: WildFront
summary: WildFront is an immersive city building CCG adventure with rogue-lite AND souls-like elements. Venture deep into the wilds AND/OR compete against other players to bring prosperity back to your city. Build and upgrade your town to unlock permanent stat upgrades, cards, artifacts & more.

name: Witch Academy
summary: Dance training even though it's a witch school? Sharpen your magical powers and aim for the top in the entertainment world!

name: Wizards Quest: Adventure in the Kingdom
summary: A faraway kingdom is shaken to its foundations when the prince is accidentally turned into a dragon. It's up to you to rebuild the city and restore it to its former glory!

name: Witches & Woodlands
summary: On the first twilight... we shall play an RPG. In this Umineko fanfic, we'll be able to see all the cousins playing a role playing game, with Beatrice as the game master. What kind of a cruel and challenging story will she weave? Will the adventurers manage to pass the seven trials? And finally - will they be able to defeat the final boss and save the day?

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion
summary:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion + Seasonal Decorative Pack
summary:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion
Seasonal Decorative Pack

name: Winter of the Arbyen
summary: 'Winter of the Arbyen' is a game that combines adventure and store manage simulation. In the world where the Ice Age has come, you must survive as a shopkeeper in a coal mine village. Find the missing father, chase the 'Firestone'. Various characters are waiting to help you or take advantage of you.

name: William and Sly: Classic Collection
summary: The world of William and Sly is yours to explore, seeking out collectables and secrets, while soaking in the tranquil visuals and melancholic soundtrack. In this pair of classic Flash games, you play as a fox, running and leaping through an atmospheric ecosystem entirely at your own pace.

name: Witchhammer
summary:
Witchhammer is a Real-Time Roguelike Deckbuilding Game.
Play as Clovelin, a card reader who was convicted as a witch and made a deal with the devil to avenge her own death. With the powers of her magical tarot deck, you will battle the Inquisition and try to destroy their most powerful weapon: the Witchhammer.
To master our real time deckbuilding roguelike you will not only learn how to avoid your enemies attacks but also how to play your cards most efficiently.
After every wave of enemies you will improve your deck, making it more powerful and adapting it to your own playstyle.

name: Witch's Library
summary: Help Vivian, the librarian witch, pick out her customer's ideal books by matching the genre they want to the books the library carries!

name: Wizard's Beard
summary: Explore locations, fight enemies, cast spells, and repeat! What more could you want in a game?

name: Wilford Island
summary: Adventure Island ROM Hack themed on diabetes advocate Wilford Brimley

name: Wild Bastards
summary: The spiritual successor to the epic strategy-shooter Void Bastards, Wild Bastards is a hybrid FPS/strategy game with heart-pounding tactical combat, detailed management systems, and a roguelike campaign. Saddle up and lead the most notorious outlaws in the galaxy.

name: Wild's Edge
summary: You've set up camp at the place where civilization turns into unexplored wilderness. Can you brave the ruthless hinterland to defeat each biome?

name: With Shining Eyes
summary: Uncover secrets, experience history, solve puzzles and understand one another. Immerse yourself and explore a surreal and colorful world in this short, first-person adventure.

name: Within the Unknown
summary: Within the Unknown is a first-person, psychological indie horror game where you regain your memory and relive the trauma from your dark past in a sci-fi simulation.

name: Wizdom Academy
summary: Build and manage your wizard academy as the headmaster. Feel the city-building thrill of constructing your magic school. Recruit students, guide them to become wizards, control resources, customize your castle, and expand your academy's influence and prestige. Start your legacy today!

name: Wild West Saloon
summary: Howdy partner! In Wild West Saloon you manage and maintain your own saloon. Serve drinks, cook food, clean tables and most importantly keep your customers happy.

name: Wipeout 2600
summary:
An Atari 2600 demake of the iconic futuristic racer by Psygnosis / SCE Studio Liverpool.

Steer with the joystick, avoid the other racers, or shoot them with your missiles. Speed up with the speed boosts and refill the clock with the energy points.

name: Windblown
summary: Brave the Vortex and dash your way to greatness in this lightning-fast action roguelike from the creators of Dead Cells. Alone or in coop, become the ultimate killing machine as you enhance your skills and master your weapons in search of that perfect run.

name: Wildwood
summary: Wildwood is a short anthology visual novel about fairy tales and folklore from Europe, Britain and Russia

name: Winter Games Challenge
summary: Faster, farther, higher!

name: Wicked Wreck
summary: Wicked Wreck allows fans of all ages to explore the World of the most amazing Way, find secret zones, explore adventures, finish the rpg quest, and interact with CineGame beloved characters. Wicked Wreck is your VIP Golden ticket to the magical world of CineGame right in your room.

name: Witchy Woes
summary: When a power hungry, egotistical young witch disobeys her schoolâ€™s headmasters, she is cast out and exiled. Play as Devious Donna as she wreaks havoc on those who have wronged her. Harness the dark arts and exact your revenge on the masters of magic.

name: Wildlife Matters
summary: Wildlife Matters is a retro puzzle-adventure game. As a young ranger, travel the globe rescuing captured animals. Explore forgotten caves, ancient temples, rare safaris, wild jungles, and stunning waterfalls. Your journey unfolds in a captivating puzzle-solving odyssey!

name: Wilder: Bahadur's Story
summary:
In a world where djinn are slaves and humans their masters, can two souls drawn together from opposite sides of the divide truly find happiness? Can they find freedom?

Bahadur has served as your family's valet for many years, and has always been your loyal companion. But he has never known a life outside the city; a life without chains.

You are the niece of an important nobleman and have lived a sheltered existence. Your whole life, you have never truly questioned the way things are.

That is about to change.

Wilder: Bahadur's Story is the second story in the Wilder collection, a series of visual novels featuring a female protagonist, hundreds of choices, two endings, and a romance that breaks all the rules.

name: Witch Tower: Flash
summary: Witch Tower: Flash is a pixel-art tower defense game featuring RPG and roguelike mechanics.

name: Wings Out of Shadow
summary: Wings Out of Shadow is a game named for a short story in the Berserker series by Fred Saberhagen, involving the hospital ship the Hope, its escort carrier Judith, and their complement of nine outnumbered fighter ships. Saberhagen wrote the in-game text.

name: Wizard of Wor
summary: The Atari ports of the arcade title "Wizard of Wor".

name: Wizard of Wor
summary:
Wizard of Wor is an arcade shooter played from a top-down point of view.

The player controls a warrior who is trapped in a dungeon. The goal is to earn as many points as possible by shooting the numerous enemy creatures which wander about the maze like corridors. The creatures wander about at various speeds, may shoot darts at the player, and some even have the ability to disappear temporarily. At the bottom of the screen the player has a radar which can be used to locate creatures that are invisible.

When the the player completes a maze, a Worluk sometimes appears. This creature moves rapidly and will only be on the screen momentarily. If the player destroys the creature before it escapes, the next dungeon will become a double score dungeon and all creatures will be worth twice as many points. Occasionally the Wizard of Wor himself may appear! He moves quickly and can teleport around the maze. If they destroy him, the player will earn a large amount of points.

The game may be played by one player or two players simultaneously.

name: Wizard of foam Magic
summary: Your task is to destroy all the monsters on the floor, and at the same time not to die, or else wait for the end of the timer counter and manage to survive.

name: Witches Wishes and Whispers
summary: Witches Wishes and Whispers is a "Einstein"-style elimination puzzle where you sort ingredients to make potions. Based on the card clues, you must pick the correct ingredients so all the clues remain true!

name: Wicked Angels
summary: From the studio of GunGirl2 and unloved, another masterpiece by the award-winning game maestro Paul Schneider. Wicked Angels is a gritty, mysterious joyride into unholy cosmic nightmares. Grip what's left of your sanity tight in this descent into the abyss.

name: Wild Angels: Episode 1
summary: An interactive visual novel about a mysterious gang who decided to break the law.

name: Wildsite
summary: Crash-landed on an unknown planet filled with plasma and toxic weather. Your only hope? Bob, a sarcastic-genius AI who will question your every survival decision. Explore, build your mobile base and try to avoid death alongside up to 3 friends in Co-op.

name: Wild River Run: Map Pack - Sci-FI
summary: Add two new locations to your lineup of levels with the Map Pack - Locations DLC.

name: WiccAtriX
summary: Wiccatrix is an ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. The elemental balance or the world of Terra has been disturbed. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.

name: Winding Heat
summary: Winding Heat is an arcade racing game released by Konami in 1996. It is the sequel to Road Fighter and Midnight Run.

name: WildSnake
summary: WildSnake was an interesting take on the Tetris concept whereby players had to guide downwards different sized snakes to make lines. These incoming snakes could be twisted into any shape you desired, therefore eliminating those tricky gaps you always ended up with in Tetris - as long as you could control the slippery slithering blocks.

name: Wings
summary: Wings is an unreleased game developed by CBS Electronics and programmed by Stuart Ross. Wings is an air combat simulation that uses a control scheme of two joysticks. The first joystick controls your plane and the second controls access to your weapons. It was originally assumed the game would use the CBS Booster Grip controller, due to a prototype box that shows Wings packaged with the controller. Wings features a fairly sophisticated control panel (for a 2600 game), containing seven different gauges that let you keep tabs on your fuel, power, airspeed, altitude, radar, horizon, and compass. Two different versions of the prototype binary exist, one NTSC and one PAL. The NTSC version of the game is dated four months earlier than the PAL version, and is noticeably different. The NTSC version is playable, but is missing the enemy planes and has numerous bugs. The PAL version is more complete, featuring a nice Wings logo and enemy planes, but also contains a bug that causes the game to crash if you continually pull back on the joystick while taking off. In addition, some of the gauges in the PAL version are not function.

name: Winter Cats
summary: Hidden Winter Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big snowy location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game

name: Wizard Hunter: The End of the Magic World
summary: Get ready for an epic adventure in this amazing world! Do you dare to take on the challenge and become the ultimate wizard hunter?

name: Wii Sports Resort: Storm Island
summary: Wii Sports Resort: Storm Island is a full in-depth modpack created by The Storm Island Team! This is a modpack that modifies and adds new features to Wii Sports Resort!

name: Wind's Seed
summary: Wind's Seed tells the story of sister and brother, Mina and Otto, who possess the unique power of "call", allowing them to focus spiritual energy in order to cast magical spells. Once they arrive in a small village, they are asked to go to the Western forest, presumably to help gather some healing plants. However, they soon learn that it was a trap, and must defend themselves in order to survive...

name: Windy Mystletainn
summary: The king asked you to take an artifact to kill the monster and save the princess, but you think it's not too late to kill the king first and then save the princess!?

name: Wings of Endless
summary:
Wings of Endless" is an action RPG that captivates with its platforming elements and a rich, pixel-art visual style. The game unfolds the story of Hariku, a confident bounty hunter whose routine mission evolves into an expansive quest, revealing the layers of a long-forgotten war. Accompanied by Owly, his mysterious talking owl, and a cast of unexpected allies, Hariku's journey spans across diverse and vivid landscapes filled with secrets, from desolate deserts and lush forests to icy expanses and marshlandsâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹.

The gameplay is dynamic, emphasizing a combat system that allows players to control three distinct heroes, each with unique abilities, and switch between them in real-time to unleash powerful combos. This system, alongside a vast world ripe for exploration, numerous side missions, a variety of challenging enemies, and intricate puzzles, ensures a gameplay experience that is both engaging and rewarding. Additionally, the game features a crafting system for consumables, further enriching the gameplay with strategic elementsâ€‹

name: Will The Man Get Frog
summary: Will The Man Get Frog is a chill little game about composing silly or sweet haikus (short poems) and sharing them with the world! Don't worry about the blank page, the game will provide words for you. Just arrange them the best you can!

name: WireWalking
summary: WireWalking is a wire-walking simulation game that mimics real physics. Players take on the role of acrobats, traveling around the world to undertake wire-walking challenges. Utilize skills to control stamina and balance, and become a master!

name: WitchGhost
summary: A spooky adventure through a weird and wonderful land. Boost your powers and change the world as you help Ezme, the WitchGhost, collect her memories so she can remeber how to go home.

name: Wit and Dice
summary: WAD is a game where players challenge each other's luck and strategy using 8 dice!

name: Witching Stone
summary: Witching Stone is a puzzle game matched with a deckbuilder! Customise your spellbook and weave spells with coloured stones.

name: Winter Fragments
summary: Winter Fragments is a cute slice of life visual novel with light yuri undertones about a couple of best friends set in 2001. Itâ€™s a nostalgic, sentimental story about the joys of creating: particularly when itâ€™s done with a dear friend.

name: Witch War
summary: In Witch War you take control of a witch and battle your way through enemies using spells and melee combat in this adventure game.

name: Wifey's Dilemma Revisited
summary: In Wifey's Dilemma Revisited, the main character marries his friend so that she can stay in the country. He had feelings for her when they were younger, but never managed to act on them. Now that she's married to him... who knows? He may be able to turn this sham marriage into a real one!

name: Wii Crush
summary: A second iteration of what was first conceived as "Project H.A.M.M.E.R.", or Machinex, Wii Crush changed the game completely, having a cartoon style. It was also cancelled.

name: Wizened Dream
summary: Withered Dream is a 2D story exploration game based on card stacking and limited-time operation. By modifying the stacking relationship between the cards, new cards can be generated and the story can be advanced. The game contains three stories: going to school, going to work, and being unemployed.

name: Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits
summary:
Williams Arcade's Greatest Hits for PlayStation and Sega Saturn is a compilation of the Arcade games: Robotron: 2084, Joust, Sinistar, Defender, Defender II and Bubbles. Also included are video interviews with the original developers.

The Sega Saturn release was published by Midway Home Entertainment and retitled to Midway Presents Arcade's Greatest Hits.

It was also released for Super Nintendo Entertainment System and Sega Mega Drive/Genesis but without Bubbles and the video interviews.

name: Wizard War Online
summary: Wizard War Online offers a P2P game mode and a game mechanic you are not used to. While flying with the sweeper, you will experience a different flight experience thanks to the customizable maneuver settings. Make strategic moves and pay attention to timing while fighting your enemies.

name: Wizarducks and the Lost Hat
summary: Have daily adventures in dungeons and exploring unmapped areas, some far away, some hidden in your own home. Cast spells to fight enemies and to solve puzzles blocking your way. Befriend the villagers, help them decorate the town. Oh, and pet your dog, he likes it.

name: Wizard Realm
summary: Wizard Realm is a dynamic game with rogue-like elements set in a fantastic 3D world. It enables players to develop various battle strategies using a multitude of magical skills to survive. It enriched with an advanced item system.

name: W.I.T.S: Initiation
summary: A puzzle game where you are the newest recruit to a government agency dedicated to stopping cyber crimes. You must prove yourself and level up in the system by solving puzzles, at the same time there is a mystery to uncover at the agency. Who can you trust?

name: With in the Obscurity
summary: A first-person perspective mystery puzzle-solving game where players immerse themselves in the role of characters involved in each episode's abnormal event to uncover the truth. The plan is to release 2 episodes per month, totaling 6 episodes per season.

name: Wizzerd Quest
summary: Wizzerd Quest is a bite-sized open-world RPG with full split-screen co-op. Its aesthetic is straight out of the mid 1990's, and it's designed to be a fun little excursion without wasting your time. Play the entire game for free with zero microtransactions or DRM!

name: Wiblu
summary: Wiblu: The Search for the Fire Tea, is a captivating video game with German mythology, following Wiblu's quest to find the legendary Fire Tea to save her sick grandmother.

name: Wildwood: Hearth & Horizon
summary: WILDWOOD: Hearth & Horizon is an immersive first-person survival game focused on exploration, settlements, and trade routes. Build a base, fight enemies and loot rare treasure. Work with your friends to carve out a toehold in a harsh and unforgiving wilderness.

name: Wildsong
summary: A monster-taming Beast-Em-Up where you fight alongside elemental beasts and help your invoker fight their way through steel and elemental magic across four elemental shrines on the path to the mysterious Ruined Throne...

name: Wildlife Rescue Simulator
summary: Get to the chopper and fly to isolated places to rescue terrified animals from man made disasters. Take photos of your adventures and share it with your loyal supporters to get donations. Upgrade your equipment in order to rescue even more animals.

name: Wild Gunslinger
summary: is a strategy game, a mixture of clicker and Western-style idle. You and your settlers need to swiftly establish a settlement, provide the front with necessary resources, and manage the economy of your city...

name: Willy's Wonderland: The Game
summary: Willyâ€™s Wonderland: The Game is a 2.5D beat â€˜em up game based on the cult film of the same name, in which a group of Animatronics come to life and slaughter people who dare visit Willyâ€™s Wonderland.

name: Windah Horror Adventure 2
summary: Join Windah Basudara and Jaya Esport friends in this challenging rage game. Each character boasts unique skills. Confront Indonesian Ghosts as epic bosses. Get ready for intense battles and unmatched horror!

name: Win or Crash!
summary: Win or Crash! is a heart-pumping racing game that will push your driving skills to the limit.

name: Winter Night
summary: "Winter Night" presents a story inspired by beliefs in Thailand. Players will experience the atmosphere of an ancient, mysterious mansion.presented through 2D PixelArt.

name: Wild Assault
summary: Wild Assault is an anthro-themed tactical shooter built with Unreal Engine 5, featuring large-scale battlefield gameplay centered around Valiant abilities. Work closely with your team, harness your instincts, and charge into battle to secure victory.

name: Winds Up Kitesurfing
summary: Winds Up Kitesurfing is an arcade-style simulation game for anyone who loves kiteboarding. It lets you live out all your kitesurfing dreams right from your own device.

name: Wish Eater
summary: Wish Eater is a horror game with touches of action where you explore a building in search of a girl who disappeared without a trace. Solve puzzles, search for clues and recreate her steps to discover the mystery of her disappearance. Depending on the investigation you will reach different endings.

name: Wizard Combat
summary: Plunge into Wizard Combat: PvP battles, leveling, customizable wizards, challenging modes, powerful spells, valuable loot â€“ become the ultimate sorcerer in this mystical world!

name: Winnie-The-Pooh Taste Test
summary: Platform through a Winnie-The-Pooh picture book. Use your reaction skills and abilities to fight creatures, explore new areas, and collect honey!

name: Wizard Mukbang: The Game
summary: Experience Wizard Mukbang like never before! You are the Mukbang Wizard, a famous food wizard. Battle cursed food and grab loot in this classic turn-based RPG as you level up and grow stronger. Gather party members and determine the fate of the Kingdom. Strange mysteries need to be solved...

name: Wizards
summary: A cancelled sequel to the Game Boy Color game Warlocked which was meant for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Wits Battle Simulator
summary: This is a 3D multiplayer online cooperative confrontation strategy game. You can cooperate or compete for the final victory. The game has many classic and innovative gameplays built in. Players can also use the editor to create their own wits games and upload them with Play with friends.

name: WizUp!
summary: Incremental game with unfolding mechanics, resource management, and WIZARDS!

name: Wife Massage
summary: â€œWIFE MASSAGEâ€ is the new game, with one beatiful wife and she needs your help. With awesome and better 3D animation!

name: Winterclaw
summary: Winterclaw is an immersive dark fantasy sim with an in-depth companion. Discover the fire within and survive the cold.

name: Wishful Journey: Love Across Time
summary: Xu yuan, who was a loser in real life traveled to an ancient palace. By transforming into the male protagonist, players will be in love with many beauties with different personalities, such as the unruly princess, the cold female assassin, embark on a love adventure that spans time and space.

name: Witherbloom
summary: The Gods provided everything - now they are gone. With one of 16 multi-class combos, plunder divine realms for resources, allies, and answers. Overcome twisted aberrations and surreal environments with 1-4 players in exciting survival-ARPG gameplay. Rebuild a shattered world... if you can survive.

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy RB Pack
summary: Play as famed legacy Running Backs Marshawn Lynch, Marshall Faulk, and Emmitt Smith, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Wind Field
summary: This is a super fun action game made with a fresh and cute cartoon style

name: Wijita: City of Makers
summary: Simulate electronics, code robots, personalize your dream workshop, and connect with other passionate makers online.

name: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Hunter Pack
summary: The Wizard With a Gun Bounty Hunter Pack includes the recipes for Musketeer, Barbarian, and Potionmaker's outfits.

name: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition
summary: Wizard with a Gun: Bounty Edition bundles the base game with the Gunmancer Pack and Bounty Hunter Pack.

name: Winter is here
summary: Fight zombies, gather resources and upgrade your base. The game is a 3D Zombie Base Builder Defense Game.

name: Winning Post 10 2024
summary: The "Winning Post" series, which celebrates its 30th anniversary in 2023, is an "authentic horse racing simulation game" in which players take on the role of an owner-breeder (horse owner and producer) and experience the drama of horses and people in the horse racing world.

name: Wind Rider
summary: Wind Rider is simple, relaxing gliding game with an endless map and Randomly generated Obstacles. A great game to fill your free time and beat your latest highest score!

name: Wizard Another World
summary: Wizard Another World - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. While fighting monsters, you must collect magical artifacts that your enemies have stolen in order to restore the balance between light and darkness.

name: Wild Animals Transporter
summary: The world keeps changing

name: Witch Challenge
summary:
Witch Challenge, Basque mythology once again avaliable in tablets and smartphones!

Return to the world of Basque mythology with Pirulina. You will test your skills in three different trials. Tartalo, Basajaun, Mari, Gaueko and other famous characters will help you overcome every challenge.

Have fun playing 3 different minigames and compete with your friends. Let's see who can make it to the top of the ranking!

name: Wily & Right no Rock Board: That's Paradise
Witchmarsh: Tea Party of the Damned
summary: Create and lead a team of four investigators in this action RPG set in Jazz Age New England.

name: Wild in the West
summary: Outcast by a frontier town, a mysterious gunslinger becomes their last hope against a ruthless robot invasion. Bullets fly, and gears grind in this epic Wild West vs. sci-fi showdown. Will classic grit prevail?

name: Wizards vs. Soldiers And Robots
summary: Grab a gun and punch those stupid wizards RIGHT IN THEIR DUMB FACES

name: Wishlands Defence
summary: Wishlands Defence is a deckbuilding tower defence game. Collect resources and craft defence towers. Protect the cute villagers from the enemy attacks.

name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship - Remastered
summary: Rediscover the breathtaking world of Windstorm, based on the established film and book series, Ostwind! Delve into the fascinating story of Mika, a girl known as a horse whisperer, as she befriends the majestic black stallion called Windstorm â€“ with fully updated graphics and a new photo mode!

name: Wizzerd Quest 2
summary: Time to save Evenfall Bay! Wizzerd Quest 2 is a first-person action RPG with full splitscreen co-op, from the developers behind the acclaimed freeware Wizzerd Quest. Liberate regions from the Rising Night in this charming retro adventure inspired by the greats of the late 90's and early 00s!

name: Within The Shadows
summary: Horror game where you're tasked with simply going to sleep. Ever since you were a kid, you've been gravely afraid of the dark. Because of this, you need to keep the nightlights on in your bedroom and bathroom. You can't quite remember why you've always had this phobia, but you sure don't want to find out again...

name: Wild Hunter 3D
summary: Aim and Shoot! Wild Hunter offers you the unique game-play that you can hunt wild animals not only on foot but also on a fast moving vehicle!

name: Witchroid Vania: A Magical Girlâ€™s Fantastical Adventures
summary: Join mage-in-training Lily on an epic adventure! Explore a multitude of worlds, including forests, deserts, and dungeons, in hopes of becoming a full-fledged mage!

name: Wild Mars
summary: A sci-fi simulation and survival game. Manage oxygen and energy, make water from ice, resist cold and radiation, grow food, mine minerals, upgrade the machinery in your Mars base just enough to produce enough fuel to return to Earth . Research and combine new elements to improve fuel production.

name: Wild West Blast
summary: Welcome to Wild West Blast â€“ Your Ultimate Adventure in the Wild West and Your New Favorite Aim Trainer!Step into the boots of a fearless bounty hunter in the heart of the untamed prairie.

name: Will I Survive Tonight?
summary: Unravel the secrets of your inherited house in this eerie survival adventure. Craft, explore, and confront the unknown to escape the nightmare within.

name: Windward Horizon
summary: Windward Horizon is an upcoming RPG-adventure set on the high seas, a sequel to the game Windward released on Steam in 2015. Trade, quest, fight, or just sail the world and fish â€” itâ€™s your choice, and you can do it alone or together with your friends.

name: With Love Comes Regret
summary: A psychological horror girls love visual novel about two girls bonding over their overbearing parents and trying to live freely. But one of the girls seems to be haunted by the ghost of her own mother.

name: Winning Lure
summary: Get your rod and reel on! A fishing game with a fishing rod accessory included.

name: Witch
summary:
Help the witch to enter her house in this short puzzle-adventure side-scroller.

Created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

name: Winglet
summary: A short 10 minute flying game.

name: Wizard Tower
summary: Seiyuu Academy, international funding has equipped the school with the newest facilities and top of the line technology, marking it as an academy that breaks the mold. Many students from abroad study at the academy, to the point foreign exchange student is no longer used to describe their role at the school.

name: Winter Mission
summary: A short, but challenging Zero Mission hack. No special manouvers beyond basic shinespark are required to beat this hack, neither are wall jumping or infinite bomb jumping.

name: Witch Wrath
summary: You come back to your house, but you don't find your spellbook where it should have been. Someone has stole it! And looks like you got some company too. Time for plan B: Guns.

name: Wizard Wars
summary: Wizard Wars is a Half-Life mod that pits teams of spell flinging wizards head to head in a magical maelstrom! Wizard Wars lets you choose from nine different sorcerers, each with varying strengths and special abilities, to battle other mages in a variety of settings and objectives.

name: Winch it Out
summary: Tired of the same old Two-Button Gas-and-Go car games? This one's for you!

name: Without a Voice: Blooming Edition
summary: DLC for Without a Voice that builds upon a free April 2024 update with full voice acting, an extra full completion bonus, and unlockable achievements. The DLC includes: four new epilogues, two new illustrations, and a built-in artbook viewer.

name: Witch's Doll
summary: Witch's Doll is a first-person psychological horror game with realistic graphics. Beware, something is lurking in the dark. Get ready for intense jumpscares.

name: Wizkid
summary: Dodge deadly blades and leap over terrifying pitfalls to unearth reality-bending artifacts and spells as the Wizkid! Explore an enormous castle and delve into its labyrinthine dungeons in this side-scrolling platformer adventure where you must ultimately face an enemy beyond imagination.

name: Wizard of the 4 Corners
summary:
Interpret a strange book of spells so you can transform into different animals and collect stars from the four corners of the world.

Created for Stop Motion Jam 2019 on the theme Shapeshifting. The game was created by H.H.Magoo in Delphi (RADstudio). The music was composed by Brother Kies using MuseScore3.

name: Withering Gardens
summary: Follow the aged-up detective in the dystopian future, trying to regain his memories back.

name: Wilderless
summary: Wilderless is a walking/hiking/photography simulator set in a fantasy wilderness. Players can explore a beautiful, procedurally generated natural open world. Tons of options allow you to configure many aspects of the world, and you can choose your initial world seed to generate different worlds.

name: Wildlife Adventures Collection: 3 in 1
summary: This bundle contains: - Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - Dolphin Spirit - Ocean Mission - Marsupilami Hoobadventure

name: Wind Rider: Military Outfit
summary: This is a cosmetic DLC which contains (Military hat, Military Cape, Military Boots). you can use any of the items to customize the appearance of your character.

name: Witching Well
summary: Welcome to 'Witching Well,' a magical world where creativity thrives. Master unusual and powerful magic and use it to shape the world around you. Build, decorate and create vibrant villages filled with unique characters. Grant wishes, make friends, and have fun. Your journey begins!

name: Within: Hannah's Journey
summary: In this turn-based JRPG, discover Hannah's strange journey into the confines of her nightmares and memories. Taking part in a mysterious place where all her regrets, mourning and mistakes reside.

name: Wizard Tournament
summary: In this party combat game, up to 4 players battle it out. Assert your supremacy as the last survivor and claim victory! Traps, alliances, betrayals - anything goes to survive in the arena.

name: Wizlite: Everybody loved RPGs
summary: â€œWizliteâ€ is an RPG that merges the old-school command battle system with the popular roguelite genre. It offers gripping moments during battles and while unlocking treasure chests, as well as strategic decisions about whether to advance or rest based on remaining health and spell count.

name: Wizwag
summary: Explore a charming, mysterious world in a classic, top-down action adventure! Investigate monster-infested dungeons, collect items to unlock new moves, and solve puzzles to uncover the truth, with help from some unusual friends.

name: Wingless Fairies
summary:
Wingless Fairies is a first-person stage play about becoming someone new again.

YOU ARE: Fawn-Mar Evangeline, a Great Fairy in training. It's your first day shadowing at your friend Velvet's gay bar / dressing room hybrid. Your role is simple on paper, but being a mentor to all who walk through the door will take more vulnerability than you know. Enter Rain.

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy WR Pack
summary: Play as famed legacy Wide Receivers Cris Carter, Steve Smith Sr. and Andre Reed, along with their unique Wild Card outfits.

name: Within the Vault
summary: Within The Vault is an action packed isometric roguelite with a heavy influence from classic film noire. Featuring dynamic dialogue, energetic big band inspired tracks, a variety of ranged and melee weapons to choose from, and unlockable permanent upgrades for endless fun.

name: Wizard Pulse
summary: Wizard Pulse is a casual shooter game about wizards. Shoot through hordes of enemies and unlock new abilities.

name: Wild Tactics
summary: The Wildest character-driven tactical strategy game you've ever seen! Build your team and maintain their relationships in the war against organized crime. Uncover the conspiracy in the animal-populated city of Clawville, and find the mastermind behind its downfall!

name: Witch of Oblivion
summary: Witch of Oblivion is a sorcerous souls-like set in an enchanting open world. Explore an ever-changing forest and wield destructive fire magic responsibly: scorch hordes of enemies and reshape the environment, but overdo it and the wild flames may cause irreversible damage.

name: Winter Burrow
summary: Winter Burrow is a cozy woodland survival game about a mouse returning home to restore their childhood burrow. Explore, gather resources, craft, knit warm sweaters, bake pies and meet the locals.

name: Wishmaker
summary: Wishmaker is an RPG inspired by Deltarune and Paper Mario's combat. Full of cute animal people and pretty pixel art.

name: Wild Eclipse
summary: Help Pieto traverse dangerous terrain and avoid the natural disasters thrown at him.

name: Widen
summary:
WIDEN is a psychological horror experience focused on atmosphere, exploration, and story-driven puzzles.
Navigate the city's empty streets, live through past distorted memories, and survive against creatures that feed on fear.

name: Wicked Arcana
summary: Step into the mystical world of 'Wicked Arcana, where ancient runes unlock powerful magic and hidden truths in this early access demo.

name: Wild West Tycoon Empire
summary: In "Wild West Tycoon Empire," you are tasked with transforming the rugged Wild West into a thriving economic powerhouse.

name: Wired Gambit
summary: Cut wires and outsmart Smuggy in the high stakes game of Wired Gambit. Strategically use your items, manage your shields, and choose your cuts carefully to emerge victorious!

name: Winged
summary: A platform game with map that unlocks books! And the books are part of the gameplay, because it is through them that the characters gain new "wings", a metaphor for the concept of "wings of the imagination" that books teach us. This game innovates by blending literature and games in a harmonious way.

name: Winter Winds
summary: Winter Winds is a grim fantasy RPG where you play as a mute, recently resurrected sadist with the mission to return the missing sun to the sky.

name: Winners Circle
summary:
Cocktail Horse Racing game in which 1 to 4 players can participate in determining the 1st and 2nd place winning horse from 7 that race against one another

Winners Circle was produced by Corona in 1981.

Corona released 2 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1981. Corona was based in United States.

Other machines made by Corona during the time period Winners Circle was produced include:

name: Winterfall
summary: After a few days of R&R, Duke Nukem returned to his work for EDF. Now he's a Detective Nukem and his job is to look after the Little Bigville, the little snow town on the edge of nowhere....

name: Wide Awake!
summary: A city block at night. Local amenities include a swimming pool, apartments, a grocery store, a sewer system and more. Duke wakes up in his hotel room, finds out that the city is under attack.

name: Windbell
summary: Windbell is a platform action game that contains roguelike random elements, hundreds of freely matched skills, and a hard-core hitting feel to bring you a super refreshing combat experience.

name: Witchblood
summary:
In this stunning, mixed-reality adventure inspired by Metroid and Castlevania, explore an intricate diorama brimming with hidden treasures, challenging puzzles, formidable foes, and powerful magic.

After a zealous madman slays your father, you uncover ancestral magic abilities. Master these newfound powers and take on the oppressive cult dominating your town. Face the murderer of your father to reveal the mysteries of your origin and the power of your birthright.

With 6+ hours of exploration and combat, hundreds of rooms, 40 upgrades, and 4 difficulty levels to master, Witchblood transforms classic gaming with VR and MR.

name: Witch Guardians: Quest for the Ancestral Magic
summary: In the kingdom of Alvera, a group of young witches embark on an adventure to save their world from darkness. Discover the power of friendship and magic in this visual novel.

name: Wizard of Wings
summary: A puzzle-adventure escape game. Solve clever puzzles set within stunning 3D graphics, exploring well-crafted environments to uncover hidden clues and useful objects. Experience the thrill of freeing the birds and advancing through this mesmerizing journey.

name: Winter Survival Simulator
summary: Winter Survival Simulator is a survival game where player find themselves stranded in a remote, snow-covered mounting forest area. With limited resources and facing extreme weather conditions, they must utilize their survival skills to stay alive until rescue arrives.

name: Wish You Happiness
summary: Move with 'WASD', switch characters with the number keys

name: WisdomGems
summary: WisdomGems is a relaxing and challenging puzzle game where you have to solve temples by moving three gems to their correct square. WisdomGems takes inspiration from traditional games like the Rubik's Cube or the sliding puzzle, providing a minimalistic and intellectual experience.

name: Wingspan: Woodland Wonders Decorative Pack
summary: From the emerald rainforest through the squat, heated baobabs to the gigantic soaring sequoias. Create your own wildlife preserve in the most beautiful forests in the world and choose a themed, adorable player portrait with Woodland Wonders Decorative Pack.

name: Wing Haven
summary: Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Collect rare and exotic feathered friends, give them plant shelter, and watch them grow in real-time! Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!

name: Wizard's Legacy
summary: Wizardâ€™s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.

name: Witch Way
summary: A dark witch imprisoned by the Church is forced to turn against her own kind, seeking the most chaotic power within the constraints of trust. This is not just a battle against enemies in action, but also requires a strategic and panoramic vision.

name: Wind Rider: Hero Outfit
summary: This is a cosmetic DLC which contains (Hero Cape, Hero Boots). you can use any of the items to customize the appearance of your character.

name: Wish Stone: Nonogram
summary:
Take off to Sky Island in search of the magic marble that grants any wish.
Go on a trip to the mysterious Sky Island with Nonogram.
Why did the King and Princess leave for Sky Island?
What choices will they make as the story unfolds?
Follow their journey to the very end with the Nonogram puzzle.

name: Wing Commander
summary: You have to protect various installations on your island in this flight simulator.

name: Winter Girl
summary: 'Winter Girl' is a visual novel game that begins with a miraculous encounter with the alien, Se-A. Combining modern direction with classic visual novel charm, it offers an immersive story and interactions. Experience various endings based on your choices.

name: Wind Story
summary: "Wind Story" is a simulation game, players can immerse themselves in rural lifestyles, including farming, breeding, and fishing. During the day, they can freely roam the Ranch's flower fields, while at night, they can enjoy drinking and dancing by the lakeside bonfire.

name: Wizard Duel
summary: Study and cast spells and prove yourself in a duel as the superior wizard.

name: WitchRider
summary: This is a building tower defense game with RPG elements to hunt down the demon guard altar.

name: Wisps of the Elements
summary: A tactical rogue-lite set in a medieval-fantastic scenery. Defend yourself against your foes, learn the magic of this realm, and discover the deepest secrets of its inhabitants

name: Wire Throne
summary: Blast your way out of captivity, upgrade your ride, and unleash devastating firepower to take down the Wire Throne! One life, one car in this roguelite top-down looter shooter!

name: Wizard's Wrath Legends
summary: A fantasy story-based MMO where FPS meets RTS in a massively multiplayer living world. Spells, skills, weapons, crafting and huge bosses!

name: Windpunk
summary: Recycle The Apocalyptic Wasteland, with a moving waste disposal plant. Craft, Refine, Survive. Restore the environment to a balanced ecosystem and recruit help by finding survivors.

name: Wishful Thinking
summary: Wishful Thinking is the first and only book of the Wishful Thinking series.

name: Witness Of Time
summary: 9 map episode similar to favillesco alpha and mano laikas.

name: Witness: A Bodyguard Romance
summary: Witness: A Bodyguard Romance is the first and only book of the Witness: A Bodyguard Romance series.

name: With Every Heartbeat
summary: With Every Heartbeat is the first and only book of the With Every Heartbeat series.

name: Witch & Fieriness
summary:
Witch & Fieriness is an action-packed adventure beat-them-up game where you take on the role of "Flameryn," the Fire Witch, who embarks on a journey to find her lost sister, "Iceika." Armed with powerful magic, Flameryn can overcome all defensive and offensive obstacles.

However, despite her fiery prowess, Flameryn is vulnerable to sunlight! Players must navigate carefully and prioritize finding water sources to keep her cool and prevent her from being overwhelmed by the scorching rays.

name: Will: Follow the Light
summary: Dive into a realistic, single-player, first-person journey through the harsh northern latitudes as you sail endless waters, searching for a way back to your loved ones. Will you follow the light?

name: Wilmot Works It Out
summary: Wilmot Works It Out is a puzzle building game about completing beautiful images and using them to decorate the walls of your house.

name: WinDepth
summary:
WinDepth is a Windows game developed by the Japanese freeware group Bio_100%. Itâ€™s an arrangement of the 1992 shooting game SuperDepth (originally for PC-9801) for Windows.
In WinDepth, players control a warship moving on the waterâ€™s surface while countless submarines lurk underwater. The objective is to destroy the submarines while avoiding their torpedoes and mines.

name: WinWar II
summary: A strategy game similar to Risk set in World War II.

name: Wikipedia Speedrun
summary: The goal of the game is to navigate from a starting wikipedia article to another one, in the least amount of clicks and time.

name: Wick3r: Cheese, Keys & Speed
summary: Join our petty thieving protagonist Wicker on his Wicked adventure about Cheese, Keys and (naturally) Speed, in this 2000s inspired Momentum 3D Platformer with radical levels and a coolness factor off the charts!

name: WitchSpring R: Costume - Silver Rose Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Red Berry Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Black Pearl Set
WitchSpring R: Costume - Shining Dawn Set
summary: Pieberry's New Costume: Shining Dawn Princess & Shining Dawn Angel

name: Wicked Room
summary: A Halloween-themed riddle solving game

name: Wild Hunter: Sniper Rifle Adventures Simulator
summary: Track your prey. Feel the suspense. Become a legendary hunter!

name: Winnie the Pooh: Honey for All
summary: In this visual novel, a mysterious event occurs in the Hundred Acre Wood. Pooh and his friends spring into action when they discover that the honey has disappeared.

name: Witch Halloween Dollhouse
summary:
Continuation Chelsea adventures: Dollhouse
This little addition sheds light on a possible future that Chelsey may have in the Doll House, and offers several scenes regarding the consequences of the exorcism. Having held on to the jester's box, Chelsey never thought she would end up on the other side of reality. In the house of broken toys, she will need to make a choice: should she stay and become a doll, or should she try to get out?

name: Witch You Want
summary:
With an oddly sparkly magical paper, you look over the job listing for a local witch needing an assistant with making potions before the town festival that weekend. Something so short notice would surely be hard for her to find workers, and you just happen to be inbetween jobsâ€”so you sign up, unsure exactly what to expect......

A pompous and questionably excellent witch runs a local apothecary in town but finds that if she wants to make enough potions before the festival that weekend to sell (and keep her ongoing potion shop afloat) she'll need some assistance. After a dubious help wanted ad, she gains you as an assistant. Will the two of you see through to the festival? Will you be able to make a single potion? Will this girlfailure capture your heart?!

name: WikiGame
summary: In WikiGame, you navigate from a source and to a destination by clicking on WikiLinks.

name: Widget Inc.
summary: A hybrid factory builder / incremental clicker game. Starting from humble beginnings, master the many crafting processes to build up resources and expand your factory. Then, using your newly automated production, unlock new technology and grow ever closer to your goal of spreading to the stars.

name: Wilt
summary: You're a little slime and there's one thing you love more than anything else: rubies! But it's not good for your health: you're wilting fast from eating them! This is a 30 stage platformer where you need to plan how you pick up collectibles to win.

name: Wild Script: Nature
summary: A unique adventure generator by a solo developer. Dive into the wilds of a mysterious world: tame creatures, forge alliances or make enemies, build your own settlement, or hunt for ancient artifacts... Your adventure begins now!

name: Wild Wafers Deluxe
summary: An old-school Commodore 64 pseudo-classic sequel now in Deluxe form.

name: Willy Byte in the Digital Dimension
summary: You are Willy Byte and transport bytes of information from the keyboard to the disk drive.

name: Wings of Njord
summary: Soar through a medieval world of mystery and serenity as a raven on a journey to uncover hidden wonders.

name: WiThu, It's Time To Go
summary: WiThu, It's Time To Go is an RPG Maker Horror puzzle game. You wake up in a familiar place. Something that everyone has is called a name, but you don't. Searching for who we are and the truth of these things. The adventures in mysterious lands are waiting for you.

name: Wild Fire
summary: WildFire is a strategic and survival game. Play as the Tribe Leader and Fire Watcher in the wild that is full of strangeness. Make decisions to be sure your tribe runs well, guide your members to do the right job to survive longer and explore the mysterious land.

name: Wild Haven
summary: Wild Haven is a nature ecosystem builder. You will build the forest and create a thriving ecosystem. Clean up polluted land, strategically place wildlife together, discover more complex plants and animals and rebuild the ecosystem your way!

name: With Sprinkles
summary: You play as Vanilla, an ice-cream boy who lives with his best pals Chocolate and Strawberry. Wander around a colorful and fun town while running errands for the big surprise!

name: Wittle Mistakes
summary: Wittle Mistakes is a mechanics-based third-person 3D adventure where players navigate the trials of infancy within the Mother Corporation. Unveil the dark secrets that Mother has been hiding. The playpen awaits!

name: Wildaria
summary: Wildaria is an Action-Adventure RPG Pet Collector set in an Infinite Fantasy World. Explore diverse open-world biomes as you collect and train unique pets to aid in your quest to conquer dungeons, slay gods, or defend the natural world from the kingdom.

name: Wildermyth: Omenroad
summary: Wildermyth's second DLC introduces a new game mode that includes roguelike â€‹â€‹tactical challenges with progression across runs, as well as a rich new story campaign that takes your heroes into the mysterious Netherflare.

name: Winning Post 10 2025
summary: The "Winning Post" series, which celebrates its 30th anniversary in 2023, is an "authentic horse racing simulation game" in which players take on the role of an owner-breeder (horse owner and producer) and experience the drama of horses and people in the horse racing world.

name: Wizards in Shorts
summary: Wizards in Shorts is a fast-paced online arena shooter. Blast your friends with fireballs, electricity, puffer fish, and mysterious blue orbs.

name: Willie's Nightfall
summary: Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willieâ€”a distorted, murderous mouseâ€”is hunting you down.

name: Wibi!Data
summary: Do you have what it takes to stop the AI from killing you before you can fix it?

name: Wintercoffin
summary: You are a hunter trapped in a blizzard. Will you make it back to your camp before you freeze to death? Featuring our own music 'A dark wood of sorrow'. Plus many different ambient sounds. Immerse yourself in this unique retro survival game. A vast and bleak open world awaits!

name: Witch's Heart: Utsukushiki Hana to Akuma no Noroi - Kanketsu-hen
summary:
A sequel to ã€Ž Witch's Heart ã€andã€Ž Witch's Heart -Bonus Stage-ã€as one of four endings, by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment). This time, it focuses on one of the main protagonists and his conclusion: Wilardo Adler.

It is an adventure game with horror themes made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, and contains simple action scenes.

Although published as a separate game, it is part of the main game.

name: Windows 95 Spiele
summary: Windows 95 Spiele is a PC compilation game by ShareBert.

name: Winterfest
summary: Winterfest is a German educational game aimed to help adults improve their reading, writing and mathematical skills.

name: Wildkeepers Rising
summary: Tame monsters! Slay waves of enemy hordes! Explore fantasy lands! Wildkeepers Rising is a whimsical action-RPG roguelite set in a beautiful hand-drawn world that combines the power curve of bullet heaven games with the compulsive fun of a creature collector.

name: Winter Games Collection
summary: Get ready for endless winter fun with a fantastic collection of arcade-inspired games!

name: Wind Traveler
summary: This is a semi open world ARPG game with HD2D pixel style. In the game, players will play the role of the story protagonist "Red haired Suka" and embark on an exciting adventure in a beautiful continent called Wind Canyon.

name: Wicked Plague
summary: Play as Ramuel, a young boy who destroys his enemies with his Gun-Lighter. Get inside a haunted building and eradicate the menace!

name: Wind's Poem
summary: In this visual novel, you will meet a group of distinct characters with different pasts from the perspective of an ordinary college student - the protagonist Luo Yu, and experience a profound love story, feeling youth and illusion in the university where you are studying.

name: Witch Please!
summary: Help Petra navigate her new life as Head Witch of Fenloft Academy! Juggle classes, train skills, make friends, and solve mysteries in this charming choose-your-own-adventure-style visual novel.

name: Will You Press the Button?
summary:
You are presented with a red button and two scenarios: one good and one bad. Both will happen if you Press The Button. Will You Press The Button? The choice is yours.

Do you like to play games that make you think, laugh, and question your choices? If yes, then you will love Will You Press The Button? - the ultimate game of moral dilemmas!

name: Winter Walk 2006
summary: Winter Walk 2006 is a short game that was originally developed in November 2020 for the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar 2020.

name: Wind Breaker: Furyou-tachi no Eiyuutan
summary: A 3D animation RPG that depicts the world of the TV anime "WIND BREAKER". You can enjoy the story of the TV anime, which is presented in 3D and anime cuts, as well as the original story of Shishitoren. In battles with simple controls, you can use "special moves" and "tag skills" to fight. There are many other elements as well. Protect the city with Sakura and his friends!

name: Winion Virus
summary: A pixel-art visual novel horror game. It features adorable and charming graphics paired with a dark fairy-tale story full of unexpected twists. As a point-and-click adventure, your task is to fix the errors occurring within the computer.

name: Wind Fantasy: NeXus
summary:
Wind Fantasy:NeXus is a TBS game.
In collaboration with 10 Taiwan's popular VTuber in depth into the cooperation, tailored to create a dedicated main storyline and permanent presence in the game, the player will be together with them in the world of wind fantasy, and the legendary heroes together to embark on an epic adventure

name: Witch & Fairy Dungeon
summary: A dungeon crawler where you control a witch accompanied by a fairy and up to three helpful monsters. Tackle many different dungeons that end in a boss fight, where you have to use various types of spells and abilities while dodging different bullet patterns.

name: Windy Creator

But one fateful day, Heal III hatches a plan to even the odds against Windi's sickness, and to cure her once and for all. 9999 Wind Is are better than 1... right? But cures for such ails don't come cheap. Raise a legion of mighty Wind I clones, expand your clinic, and send Wind I to work and on adventures to secure funding as you research and develop the cure to end all cures! Part raising sim, part board game-esque RPG, and 100% classic VIPRPG fun in Kiito's signature style.

name: WinterBunny444
summary: A surreal adventure game about a trans girl named Sue and her newfound love Esther.

name: Windborn: Journey to the South
summary: Guide your bird south, staying with your flock. Soar through speed boosts, embrace the skies, and donâ€™t fall behind. Can you keep up?

name: Winter Lord
summary: Welcome, my lord! In this game, you rule over an ancient, snow-covered kingdom famous for forging legendary weapons. The frozen land harbors many dangerous creatures, but also hides rich treasures that attract adventurers. Equip these brave souls, and they will stand by your side to defend your city.

name: Wilbur Soot's Incelbur
summary: Wilbur Soot's Incelbur is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on Minecraft YouTuber Wilbur Soot.

name: Witch of the Meta Loop
summary: This is a Roguelike adventure game with Meta elements. You are a witch, yet not a witch. Step through the magic mirror, break the fourth wall, and uncover the real you!

name: Windborn: Wings of Fate
summary: Soar through the sky and master the wind!

name: Wizards of Nature
summary: Wizards Of Nature is an open-world, first-person, fantasy RPG game by William Jacob. Recover the fallen Cities of Ziran by defeating terrible monsters that the Necromancer left behind.

name: Witch Stories
summary: First-person retro horror RPG. Non-linear, open world, branching dialog, voice acted, simple controls, and tons of easter eggs to discover. Set in the 1700s. You are a woman living in a cottage in the forest with your husband and newborn baby. Your story unfolds over two days, whether you choose to act or not.

name: Winter Hubris
summary: A point-and-click horror game where you must survive in an isolated base as you wait for rescue.

name: Withering Realms
summary: A ghost and her doll guardian explore the mysterious town of Penwyll and the sprawling graveyards, tombs, caves and rotting estates that surround it in this Horror Action RPG from the creator of Withering Rooms.

name: Winken
summary: Winken: The rhythmic piano game where you read real sheet music, on a real score! Ready to rethink your definition of piano game and rhythm game? Beginner or Expert, get ready to discover something new with Winken: a game where you really play music.

name: Windah Horror Adventure
summary: In this 3D top-down horror game, you play as Windah Basudara, a popular Indonesian YouTuber who gets trapped in a world of Indonesian urban legends. Your goal is to escape and survive the game's many obstacles, including traps and bosses in the form of Indonesian ghosts.

name: Witchâ€™s Gaze: The Vanishing Village
summary: Embark on a mystical quest that blends Slavic folklore with arcane witchcraft, uncover hidden secrets, and rescue a village lost to the shadows in this magical detective visual novel. Oh, and never forget your cat - he might save you!

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals Triple Pack
Wish Ready Go!
summary: â€œWish Ready GO!â€ is a game combines visual novel, simulation and role-playing. In the game, players will role as an goddess candidate, who need to pass the final exam to be a real goddess. Make your choices carefully, and help the heroine to finish her tasks!

name: Wild Cheetah Sim 3D
summary: Have you ever wondered what it is like to be Wild Cheetah? Now you finally have a chance to know that feeling! Join the battle in this super epic adventure delivered in stunning 3D. Be a Wild Cheetah and survive in the wilderness as long as you can. Start your own family of cheetahs, fight against fierce animals like lion, crocodile and rhino. Evolve your Cheetah to become the strongest Cheetah ever.

name: With The Fire And Sword
summary: Turn-based strategy game with role-playing elements. WTFAS is a round PvP battle between several opponents until one winner remains. Play in pairs with a friend, improve your hero, army, artifacts, economy, etc. The main goal of the game is to stay alive longer than your opponent...

name: Wild Growth
summary: A short, action-packed incremental healer game set in a grim norse world.

name: Wingspan Oceania Deluxe Bundle
summary: Create the most amazing bird habitats in this complete Wingspan experience.

name: Windstorm: Start of a Great Friendship Remastered - Complete Edition
Winter Bundle: 20 games
summary: I can't believe it! 20 games!

name: Wizard's Warp
summary: Always wanted to learn how to teleport? Try not to get stuck in a wall! Wizard's Warp, a platformer that challenges those who are not afraid of hard challenges. Get to the top to save your favorite cat! But if you fall down, be ready for a rough landing.

name: Wine Factory Simulator
summary: Grow, Harvest, Create â€“ The Art of Winemaking Awaits!

name: Wildlife Sports: Untamed
summary: Join your friends in a silly sports Showdown! Choose your totem animal and compete in wacky games. With simple yet entertaining gameplay, enjoy quick matches or all-night sessions of endless fun and laughter. Who will reign supreme?

name: Wild Willy West
summary: Wild Willy West is a western top-down shoot 'em up, featuring action packed levels and instant death combat. Use an arsenal of magical bullets to blast your way through the old west, and take revenge on those who wronged you.

name: Wild Horizon: Edge of Survival
summary: Survive. Solve. Escape! Stranded after a plane crash, navigate a breathtaking deadly wilderness. Master the elements, outsmart predators, and solve intricate puzzles to survive. No craftingâ€”just skill, stamina, and strategy. Can you conquer the wild and make it home, or will the horizon claim you?

name: With Dream
summary: This is a story about two doctors who travel back in time to fulfill the last wish of a dying old man.

name: Without a Dawn
summary: Without a Dawn is a dark, psychological, and philosophical visual horror novel featuring a hauntingly beautiful pseudo-ASCII art developed by award-winning Finnish solo developer Jesse Makkonen (DISTRAINT -series, Afterdream, Heal).

name: Will
summary: Are you prepared to let go?

name: Winter Clothing
summary: This is a horror plot puzzle game with Chinese folk themes. There is an unwritten rule in Tianhe Town: on the day of the Winter Clothing Festival, no villager is allowed to approach the back mountain. Is there really a ghost on the mountain? Perhaps there is something more terrifying than ghosts.

name: Witch Pachi

name: Witch Maker

name: Wild Blue Skies

name: Wizard Cats

name: Witch Hunt
summary:
In a formerly peaceful village, mysterious incidents are taking place.
The climax is reached when one night five of the villagers disappear.
The mayor gives you the task of investigating what happened.

summary: Wilderness: Survival is a single or multiplayer survival game. It is a pirate-like game where you can hunt, mine,fightning ,farming,gun crafting,fishing, fight skeletons and evolve. Duel with your friends etc. You can do. The game is still under development, please give constructive criticism.

name: Wilde Investigations: The Zoo Kerfuffle - Collector's Edition
Wilde Investigations: Animal Sanctuary Shuffle - Collector's Edition
Wizards and Knights

name: Wild Hearts S
summary:
The maximum number of players for both online and local play has been increased from 3 to 4 players.

The update of additional beasts and modes in â€œWILD HEARTSâ€ is included from the start.

This does not include additional weapons, Karakuri, or beasts. HDR is not supported.

Balance Adjustments.

Players battle against AI opponents, explore various locations, and follow a story involving mysterious events at the academy, aiming to save the land.The gameplay involves matching tiles to meet quotas or battle opponents, incorporating RPG elements like character evolution and item shops

name: Wings of the Kite in Sky

name: Wild Ones Battle Stadium
summary: Wild Ones Battle Stadium is a 2D turn-based game where players control animals in battles, earning points, coins, and experience. Customize the game with equipment and pets, join clans, and compete in modes like Battle Royale.

name: Wildcat Snack Attack

name: Windows Separate Worlds: Chapter 1
summary: Journey through surreal digital realms as a newly conscious bot seeking meaning in existence. Discover this world where the abstract, arcane, and future fuse together in this surrealist environment.

name: Wizard Hand
summary: A magical deckbuilder game where solitaire meets roguelike. Uncover dazzling combos and accumulate points with the help of enchantments, crafting, and a collection of powerful artifacts.

name: Wicked Seed
summary:
Wicked Seed is a modern-day horror RPG with tactical combat and survival horror roots.

Hybrid Combat System: Combine real-time actions like dodging and parrying with strategic turn-based attacks.

Rewarding Exploration: Discover hidden paths, solve optional puzzles, and find unique items that enhance your abilities.

Customization: 50 unlockable costumes and a variety of weapons and accessories to tailor your play style.

name: Will She?
summary: You want her to be your date for the dance but it is in 5 days. Will you be able to build up the courage to ask her in time, or will you have to go to the dance alone this year?

name: With My Buddy
summary: Care for dogs and cats in this apple arcade-exclusive game.

name: Will Jump
summary:
Discover "Will Jump," a captivating platformer that immerses you in a retro universe filled with challenges.
Play as Will, a fearless locksmith, a hero who races with his keys.
Get ready to conquer 23 thrilling levels spread across 6 unique biomes.
With its "die & retry" gameplay, each attempt will bring you closer to victory or a nervous breakdown.
Dive into this pixelated adventure and take on the challenge of conquering each platform!

name: Windborn: Concrete Jungle
summary: Guide your bird through a thrilling world, staying close to your flock as you soar through giant cities. Fly through speed boosts, enjoy the freedom of the skies, and ensure you don't get left behind. Can you keep up with the flock and reach your destination?

name: Williams Digital Arcade
summary:
The first known arcade emulation available publicly was the Williams Digital Arcade series from Digital Eclipse Software, released for the Macintosh in 1994. This series featured the Williams Electronics' arcade classics Joust, Defender and Robotron: 2084. In 1995, it was repackaged and expanded upon as Williams Arcade Classics for the PC.

For these games, Digital Eclipse developed an interpreter that emulated the games' arcade machines' chipset, including the Motorola 6809 central processing unit. This approach was meant to have the emulations act true to the original versions of these games, and not carry any imperfections direct ports could have introduced.

name: Wireframe Warfare
summary: Wireframe Warfare is a Singleplayer Action/Tower Defense hybrid game created by a solo developer over the course of a year. Blast and strategize your way through various levels, combating waves of viruses attacking Cyber Beacons across the pathways of a digital space.

name: Wild West Pioneers
summary: Follow the American dream and start settling in the frontier with the city-builder Wild West Pioneers. Build and manage your ever-growing villages, establish production chains as well as outposts and build trade routes to support your cities and outposts.

name: Wish Me Well
summary: Wish Me Well is a roguelike dungeon crawler where you design your own weapon with magic scrolls and fiddle with synergies to fight enemies and unique bosses possessed by ink. Jump into the magic well and save the world of books from ink monsters!

name: WildAge
summary: A platformer-puzzle game You play as two dragons with different abilities. One dragon can jump, and the other can push magical stones.

name: Wilderness Edge
summary: Wilderness Edge is an open-world survival game set in a remote, untamed wilderness where players must explore, hunt, and gather resources to stay alive. Featuring a dynamic day-night cycle and an evolving ecosystem, the game includes AI-driven wildlife behavior, crafting systems, and character progression through primitive survival skills. Designed for single-player or multiplayer experiences, Wilderness Edge emphasizes environmental immersion and self-reliance in a world without civilization.

name: Williams Pinball Classics

name: Window of Perspectives

name: Winter Games

name: Wirelight
summary: A tiny turn-based tactical... soulslike! Explore a twisty, interconnected world, battle enemies using a unique spin on a 'posture' system, and employ different combinations of upgrades to your advantage.

name: Witchy Wonderland
summary: Witchy Wonderland is a thrilling horror-park simulator where you're not just building attractionsâ€”you're crafting nightmares.

name: Wildrise

name: Winoa Wizard's Witchy Quest to Womanhood vs. the Botanical Bitches

name: Wild West Supermarket Simulator
summary: Run a General Store in the Wild West. Customize and expand your shop. Make sure that your customersâ€™ constantly changing needs are satisfied. Work every job yourself or let your employees stack the shelves and work the till. Find out what it feels like to own a Wild West Supermarket.

name: Wizard's Fortress: Tower Defense
summary: Defend your fortress with the power of magic!

name: Will the King Escape?

name: Wipeout Portable Collection

name: Wiz-herd

name: Wingspan: Asia Expansion

name: Will O Wisp

name: Wide Load
summary: PARK. THAT. THING.Welcome to WIDE LOAD, the precision parking chaos simulator you never asked forâ€”but absolutely need. Take control of an 18-wheeler and try to wedge, slide, drift, or pray into parking spaces that definitely weren't built with you in mind.

name: Wildbound
summary: Explore Avium, a vast, majestic land made up of breathtaking scenery. Collect over 200 unique Wilds that inhabit the lands using your Catalyst, a powerful device used to collect and command Wilds. Battle other Catalyst Carriers in a turn-based RPG format.

name: Winnie the Pooh's Book Writing Speedrunner

name: Wild Shot: Animal Savior

name: Wisp Gunner

name: Witchlight

name: Wizzo PopOut
summary: Wizzo Popout is a fast-paced, 3D top-down arena shooter for up to 4 players. Play as an arcane wizzo riding a bouncing magic bubble! Cast cool spells, dodge enemy blasts, and knock your rivals out of the arena in hilariously chaotic battles.

name: Widget Warriors
summary: A warrior living on your desktop? Yes! Defeat enemies, collect coins, unlock skills, and face off against bossesâ€” all within a portable widget that lives right on your desktop.

name: Winnie-the-Pooh Hops for Honey

name: Without a Clear Path
summary:
Without a Clear Path is a collaborative English Yume Nikki parody fangame originally started and managed by Doc Saturn in 2018 and then later managed by Calci Soya and assisted by JPiggs. The protagonist was designed by Saibibi.

The game's concept is that it is a fangame where every single world is a maze. It features contributions from many different developers, and a full list of credits can be found in the game's folder.

name: Witch of Eclipse
summary: Travel the world as a witch and help the people by defeating threats, going to dungeons in search of materials, and granting other special favors.

name: Wing Commander II: Vengeance of the Kilrathi
WingWhiz
summary: WingWhiz is a fast-paced arcade shooter with rogue-lite elements. Unlock unique planes, dodge bullets, fire rockets, and blast enemies into pieces. Survive random encounters, defeat brutal bosses, and push further every run. Adapt or explodeâ€”the sky wonâ€™t stay the same.

name: Wind Fantasy II: Alive
summary:
Shuilan is a land that hovers above the ocean. Recently, a demon lord appeared nearby. The people of Shuilan know that the demon lord's plan is to invade and to conquer their country. The wise teacher Wentini builds a special unit of fighters, called the Fate Travel Group. She knows that the only one who can help the people of Shuilan is a girl with special powers, named Li Fu. She sends a young fighter named Ares to find Li Fu, but meanwhile Shuilan is invaded by a hostile army. The battles for survival begins...

Fengse Huanxiang 2, also known as Wind Fantasy II, is set in a fantasy world, unlike most Chinese RPGs, which prefer concrete historical setting in China. The game is more close to Japanese RPGs in style, being heavily influenced by anime art. Unlike other games in the series, it has no elements of strategy/tactical RPG. You navigate your party from location to location, fighting random enemies and bosses on the way. The game uses Final Fantasy-like third-person perspective in battles, yet the battle engine is not active time, but turn-based.

name: Wiped Clean
