name: Wipeout
summary: A homebrew port of Wipeout for Dreamcast.

name: Winter-Over
summary:
Pickering Station, Antarctica: A place of science, knowledge, and deep isolation. When the last plane leaves for the winter, you and your colleagues may as well be on Mars. At least this winter-over has gone well so far â€” or as well as can be expected with a dozen or so eccentrics locked up together.

But then someone turns up dead...

You have ten days until the next plane arrives and law enforcement takes over the investigation, and by then the perpetrator will have covered their tracks. Can you bring them to justice first? And can you keep your sanity in the process?

name: Witch War 1
summary: Witch War 1 is a fast-paced top down shooter with strategy elements where you lead an army of witches into battle. You combine elements to create new spells and harness their power to conquer the world before your enemies do.

name: Wicked Cabins
summary: Wicked Cabins is a tiny relaxing builder where you design cozy dioramas set in the most uncozy places. Create eerie little sanctuaries in a game with a horror twist, where you're not escaping the darkness - youâ€™re making it feel like home.

name: Wicked Little Witch
summary: A city witch lost in the woods, face enemies both familiar and strange. In this Action Roguelite, unlock new characters, collect spells, and build your own playstyle and uncover the truth.

name: Williams Pinball: The Getaway - High Speed II
Williams Pinball: Red and Ted's Road Show
Williams Pinball: Tales of the Arabian Nights
Williams Pinball: Indiana Jones - The Pinball Adventures
Williams Pinball: Pro Difficulty
summary: Enables "Pro Difficulty" (a tournament-grade difficulty) on all tables.

name: Williams Pinball: Pro Physics
summary: Enables "Pro Physics" on all tables. This is a more authentic pinball physics simulation.

name: Winning Post 5 Maximum 2003
summary: Maximum 2003 is an updated release of Winning Post 5, featuring race programs and rosters updated for the 2003 race season. Compared to the previous edition, the jockey training system has been modified to add additional options, and two more additional difficulty levels have been added.

name: Witch's Tower
summary: An innovative Tower of the Sorcerer strategy game with unique gameplay mechanics.

name: Wildseed
summary: A relaxing game where you grow plants and attract creatures as you build your garden. Keep your creatures happy and your plants healthy, find rare variants, and discover the ancient secrets your garden holds - one seed at a time.

name: Wiffleball Legends

Build your dream team to win a championship in season mode, crush home runs in a home run derby mode and lead your team to the national championship in Story Mode

name: Wish Upon a Cat

name: Wilds of the Realmwalker
summary: A four-player cooperative survival game in which wizard explorers and their magical companions embark on enchanting adventures filled with spell crafting, exploration, and cozy, collaborative gameplay.

name: Wildheart Gourmet
summary: Unlock the mysteries of a strange yet familiar world and forage real wild plants & herbs in this curious, peaceful adventure. An experimental interactive fiction cook-em-up with educational elements.

name: Wilderlocke
summary: WILDERLOCKE is a tactical monster-taming roguelike. Build up a team of diverse & powerful monsters. Find the perfect combinations of moves, passives & stats to create devastating synergies. Triumph in increasingly challenging 2v2 turn-based battles and become unstoppable.

name: Winter Games Collection + Advent Calendar
summary: Hop aboard a train and ride through the Winter Valley discovering 25 exciting and fun games!

name: Wires and Whiskers
summary: Wires and Whiskers is a local co-op action-puzzle game where two players control a lab-engineered gerbil and its magnetic exosuit. Work together to fight mutated enemies, solve magnetic puzzles, and survive in a ruined, post-apocalyptic trench world.

name: WildStandZ
summary: WildStandZ is a multiplayer zombie action shooter for first-person survival with an open world in which you will have to lead a small squad of survivors. Every night can be the last! Every God-forsaken wasteland keeps its secrets! Every choice has unturned consequences! This is a new story, a new destiny, end of which you will shape yourself. Try to survive - hordes of zombies want to taste the flesh and blood - there are plenty of them here, survival is your priority! Use a variety of weapons: knives, grenades, rifles, pistols - the remains of the military base now belong to you. Fight the virus that has struck the planet: study locations (laboratory, bunker, abandoned city), collect items, look for food and ammunition - they will definitely come in handy. Form clans and alliances with other survivors, create bases and shelters - this is the only way to defeat the walking dead. Or be a loner, fight enemies and loot the bases of other players. However, you must remember that there are zombies, zombies and zombies around!

name: Wizard Fight!
summary: Wizard Fight is a bullet hell game where you play as the blue wizard and battle various types of monsters. Enjoy dodging curtains of bullets with a retro aesthetic. Collect keys to venture deeper into the dungeon to claim the holy grail and secure epic victory!

name: Wild Lynx Jigsaw
summary: Step into the untamed wilderness with "Wild Lynx Jigsaw"â€”a captivating puzzle game that lets you piece together the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx. From 30-piece relaxing puzzles to intricate 285-piece challenges, immerse yourself in stunning scenes of the lynx roaming its natural habitat.

name: Wild Lynx Jigsaw: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Expand your journey into the untamed wilderness with Wild Lynx Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 1! This captivating expansion introduces brand-new levels that let you piece together even more of the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx.

name: Wild Lynx Jigsaw: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Expand your journey into the untamed wilderness with Wild Lynx Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 2! This captivating expansion introduces brand-new levels that let you piece together even more of the beauty and mystery of the majestic lynx.

name: Wise in the Heights
summary: Climb a treacherous mountain one charged jump at a time while answering quick-fire trivia. Every correct choice creates a safe landing, every mistake is a fall. Reflex platforming meets brain-teasing quiz in this single-player challenge.

name: Wild Wordopia
summary: A new mobile game about learning etymology

name: Wittle Defender
summary: A unique mix of tower defense, Roguelike, and card strategy.

name: Winter Witch
summary: A cozy game about a witch who lived in the woods. Explore and craft as you traverse deeper into the woods.

name: Witches' Hand
summary: A 2-8 player card game where the goal is to trick other players into picking terrible cards. By rotating and moving cards to nudge the other player into picking a bad card. Alternatively, communicate to your friends to pick a bad card.

name: Wild Web
summary: This is a relaxing turn based puzzle adventure game. This is a closed island, so hungry. Anyway, first defeat the creatures on the island to fill your stomach, and then walk all the way to the other end of the island.

name: Wiener Coffee
summary: Wiener Coffee is a 3D action game where a wiener protagonist adventures toward a coffee cup.With simple jump & retry controls, you'll start over if you fall to the floor! The unique stages and surreal character are what make this game special.

name: Wilderless: Meadowfell
summary: Welcome to Meadowfell, the newest addition to the Wilderless series - a cozy open-world game crafted for those who seek to unwind and explore at their own pace. Immerse yourself in a serene, untamed wilderness designed for relaxation and creativity, perfect for players who enjoy non-violent exploration and cozy escapes.

name: Winged Joust Into Dawn
summary: A short ghost story interactive poem with 2 endings. Made with chia's "engine.lol".

name: Wish on this Flower
summary:
A short kinetic visual novel at 3,000-4,000 words. Linear narrative, single-ending.
(Approx. 10-15 mins play time).

Choose your path carefully and upgrade your ship along the way. Outwit your opponents and master the dice to claim victory!

name: Wima Magicamia: Cute Girls Magic Battle 3DTPS
summary: It's 3D-TPS of Magic battle for Single player. This 3D TPS Game is that Cute Girls will versus each other with magic attack. By Drawing Magic Rune By Mouse, you can use magic of kinds which you drew the rune. By magic attacks, If enemy's HP will be zero, you will win.

name: Wiggle Wiggle Bush

name: WitchSpring R: The Followerâ€™s Fall
summary: This update includes post-ending stories of the main characters, tales of new warlords, and a new storyline centered on a mysterious follower.

name: Winter Makes Me Lonely but at Least I Have You
summary:
a short extremely indulgent spinoff of Yuki's 4P i wrote for the holidays while feeling sick!

this is a kinetic novel of ~3k words with no choices, so sit back with a cup of hot cocoa or warm soup and enjoy!

playing the original game isn't required, but i recommend it so you get to know the characters better!

Winnie The Pooh can use a hostile approach by using ranged weapons to kill as many enemies as possible. The game has many enemy types including melee police, pistol police, sniper police and even helicopters. This game has many wanted levels which will affect the spawned police.

name: Withdrawal

name: Witchcrafter
summary: Witchcrafter TCG is the definitive cross-platform strategy card game â€” featuring lightning-fast Duels, stunning HD visuals and versatile play rules!Prepare to test your skills against Duelists from around the globe!

name: Windowframe

name: Wild Wizards
summary: Get WILD in this fun arena game! Filled with cute animals and arcane magic, choose your wizard and battle your friends to show everyone who the most powerful wizard is! Ranging from fire wands to poison wands, and explosions in between, join in on the fun in this WILD game!

name: WinMon
summary: Raise, feed, and farm your cute little monsterâ€”right on your desktop! A relaxing idle game to help you unwind, even on stressful days.

name: Winnie the Pooh: Piglet's Special Day
Winnie-the-Pooh: Black Honey
summary: Explore an open-world 100 Aker Woods while outwitting a twisted Winnie-the-Pooh who wants to eat you. Upgrade yourself and craft elaborate traps to stop him using black honey.

name: Wirm

Gather resources and craft to create a unique home with your animal friends. Turn a shabby, lonely space into a warm, lively haven!

name: Winter Sadness Simulator
summary: An atmospheric walk through a post-Soviet courtyard with depressing music.

name: Witchâ€™s Lewd Curse
summary: An adult fantasy visual novel where youâ€™re cursed by a powerful Witch and must gather lewd energy from seductive monster girls to break free. Explore a magical realm, build intimate relationships, and uncover the dark secrets behind Witchâ€™s Lewd Curse.

name: Wild Pussies
summary: The game "Wild Pussies" is a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image. The game has hot levels, as well as a gallery, after completing a level, you can review your victories here.

name: Wild Snap
summary: Wild Snap is a relaxing short puzzle game about finding creative, strange and logical ways to attract animals and take pictures of them.

name: Winter Heat

name: Witch Zoe: Hentai Shuffle

name: Wise Escape From Prison
summary:
In prison where aliens crashed, people are infected with unknown viruses except you! Escape from prison by throwing THE STONE!

This game is made by Korean TEENS!

name: Winning Tactics
summary: Your mission is to defend the castle, using its power to summon warriors at crucial moments of the battle

name: Windweaver
summary:
You are a Windweaver â€” once a guardian of the skies, now stripped of your full power. Cast from the heights, you must begin the long journey back to the Isle of Wind, relying only on the faint power that remains within you. Every step matters. Every jump demands precision. By bending the wind still at your command, youâ€™ll run faster, leap farther, and cling to walls as you scale your way through a world of environments, obstacles, and pathways.

This high-speed action platformer has a direct emphasis on fluid movement and slope physics, where players will chain their abilities with environmental elements to build up incredible speed and execute spectacular combos to blitz through levels. Experience the thrill of windsurfing down mountain slopes, wall-running through ancient ruins, and soaring through the air as keep running to restore your lost flight - and maybe even discover the truth of your world as you meet new friends along the way!

name: Wild Chorus
summary: An adventure game, but you play musical instruments instead of swinging swords. Gather adorable Sound Sprites, cut through the looming Silence, and rebuild the soundtrack of this hand-illustrated world in whatever way you see fit. No musical ability required!

name: Winemaker Simulator
summary: Step into the Medieval Mediterranean and live the life of a vintner. From tending your vineyard to harvesting, winemaking, and trading, every decision shapes your craft. Will you create the most exquisite and valuable wine?

name: Winter's Wrath
summary: In this challenging tower defense game, place and upgrade your towers to fend off relentless waves of foes. With limited resources, every decision matters. The frost is unforgivingâ€”so must be your defense.

name: Winterlight: Where Silence Says It All
summary: As Elias returns to the coastal town that once sheltered him, heâ€™s pulled into a slow winter of connection, memory and quiet decisions. Take the role of this young man and guide the choices he makes, surrounded by the warmth of townspeople young and old, often holding conversations in a bookstore over shared coffee.

name: Wishfarers
summary: Wishfarers is a turn-based, tactical RPG with streamlined platformer movement, explosive combat, and destructible terrain. Join a plucky band of adventurers as they chase shooting stars, face mysterious foes, and fulfill wishes both big and silly.

name: Witch of Mystery Tower
summary: "Witch of Mystery Tower" is a witch x gem elimination x interactive erotic game. Itâ€™s a turn-based game that you need to fight against witches by eliminating magical gems. As the witch's magical value decays until she is unable to battle with the player, it starts the interactive erotic stage.

name: Wild Omission
summary: Wild Omission is an open world sandbox survival game with severe weather set in an infinite procedurally generated world. Play alone or with friends.

name: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
summary:
The so-called "New & Improved Version" was a later, updated release of the original Apple II and PC Booter release from the early 80's. Unlike to original release, featured a larger graphic window and slightly more colors, depending on the computer.

Rather infamously, the MS-DOS version introduces a bug where upon leveling up, there was a small chance a characters stats would decrease.

name: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
Wizardry Scenario #1: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
Wiztyle
summary: A bite-sized incremental tile-matching adventure! Travel across diverse lands and upgrade yourself to become the strongest wizard!

name: Wild West Shooter
summary: With a captivating single-player campaign and optional multiplayer modes, the game offers an authentic cowboy experience. Players explore different locations, upgrade their weapons and develop strategies for fast-paced shootouts, ensuring an adrenaline-fuelled adventure.

name: Wicked Subway
summary: They were just two best friends on a mostly empty train. The night train, the last one of the night that usually took all the lonely women home after the clubs had closed. What sort of trouble could this futa lesbian couple find in such a public setting?

name: Wild West: The Last Cowboy
summary: Become the last cowboy of the Wild West and engage in thrilling 1v1 shootouts! Wild West: The Last Cowboy is a VR western shooter game featuring charming casual graphics and fast-paced action.

name: Witch Play House
summary: Witch Play House is an unconventional fantasy collection-adventure game that seamlessly blends exhilarating monster-slaying action with a deep collection system. The game features a unique "aesthetic of feet" theme, creating a mysterious world brimming with whimsical imagination.

name: Wind Tunnel Simulator
summary: Wind Tunnel Simulator is a creative physics sandbox game that combines intuitive 3D sculpting with realistic aerodynamic simulation. Design and test your own experimental shapes using clay-like modeling tools, then watch them come alive in a state-of-the-art virtual wind tunnel.

name: Wildfire
summary:
A RetroFab recreation for Web Browsers of the handheld LCD pinball game "Wildfire" from ParkerBrothers

Wildfire is a multi-player electronic pinball game released by Parker Brothers in 1979 that "plays and sounds like the real thing" (that's what it says on the box) but in an innovative portable format.

In Wildfire up to 4 players take turns to try and score as many points as possible on a portable electronic pinball machine.

name: Will of Destiny
summary: Roguelike deckbuilder with a unique SPIN! As a guardian spirit, you use the magical wheel and cast spells to help human souls to overcome life's obstacles. Forge your custom wheel (deck) and unleash the ultimate combos to fulfill their destinies!

name: Willow's Paper House
summary: A mystery adventure puzzle game about a girl searching for her brother in an arcane hospital full of monsters and patients who have lost their memories.

name: Wind Chill
summary: Working as a Search & Rescue officer, you must keep yourself sane and log objects you find in the woods, all while facing off against twisted creatures. With a flashlight as your only pair of eyes, you have until 6AM to find your subjects. Good luck, and remember, DO NOT GO NEAR THE STAIRS.

name: Winterreach Emporium
summary: Run your own fantasy ski shop in the frosty peaks of Winterreach. Stock magical gear, serve a variety of races, hire and manage staff, research upgrades, and adapt to festivals, shortages, and the shifting demands of a living, lore-rich world.

name: Wild Explorer
summary: Wild Explorer takes you on an immersive journey deep into the wild. Capture stunning photos of wildlife, explore ancient monuments, and uncover hidden secrets. Use your torch to navigate the darkness and complete your exploration book with every discovery. Are you ready for the adventure?

name: Windborn: Echoes of the Night
summary: Guide your bird south, stay with the flock, and soar to the finish!

name: Witness to Plague
summary:
Are you interested in plague during the medieval times?
Then, this short-quiz game is for you.
Test your knowledge of history of medieval plague and then unlock a short movie called "Witness to Plague"

name: Winter Hunting
summary: Winter Hunting is a Roguelite match-3 game. Matching tile to hunt beasts, gather firewood and grow stronger. Survive for 60 days to win the game!

name: Window Aquarista
summary: Create your dream aquariums while you do other things in this relaxing idle game that sits on the bottom of your screen. Unlock new fish and watch them thrive with your help. All at your own pace.

name: Wild Tower
summary: "Wild Tower" is a Three Kingdoms-themed top-down combat game with Souls-like and light Rogue elements. Enter the tower to explore the unknown, face challenges, and experience combat.

name: Winter Mercenary
summary: Select your weapons, kill enemies and reach the objective in the given time.

name: Wild Wild Westbound VR: Being Jude the Lawless
summary: A fast-paced VR western roguelite where you must defend your treasure from waves of monsters, earn high scores, and upgrade your arsenal.

name: Wizard's Oblation
summary: Wizard's Oblation is a co-op horror for 1â€“4 wizards. Step through a portal and hunt for artifacts that hold unique spells.

name: W.I.T.C.H.
summary: W.I.T.C.H. is a singleplayer mini-games game in the Disney series.

name: Wilva
summary: Wilba is a side-scrolling action platformer game influenced by classic action RPG games.

name: With Me: Aquatic Time
summary: With Me: Aquatic Time! is a gamified focus tool where you raise fish and design your aquarium. With soothing music, flowing water, and gently swimming fish, it creates a relaxing space to boost focus. Discover, breed, and nurture fish while personalizing your tranquil aquatic world.

name: Window Garden
summary: Manage your garden on your desktop and experience its ups and downs. Watch the weather change, plants grow, and enjoy the beautiful music! This game has been specially designed to avoid interfering with your normal work.

name: Windwoven
summary: You inherit forest edge land. Daily, till soil with your hoe grow radishes, rear chicks, bond with oddball neighbors. Spring seeds yield summer gardens; autumn's firelit pumpkins reveal woodland mysteries. Nighttime under trees, fireflies dance like starlit constellations, this is your idyllic life.

name: W.I.M.S.
summary: A first person precision platformer where you try to escape a kitchen as a little alien.

name: Willowâ€™s Descent: Into the Under
summary: Experience the beautiful, hand-drawn world of the Arretai in this atmospheric precision platformer. Dive deeper into the Under and overcome unique platforming challenges in search of your missing sister.

name: Wild Roots
summary: Wild Roots is a thrilling farm and cooking adventure! Grow crops, raise animals, and battle critters trying to steal your hard-earned goods. Harvest, cook up mouthwatering dishes, sell for cash, and expand your farm by clearing land. Defend, cook, and conquerâ€”your farmâ€™s fate is in your hands!

name: Witch's Brew: Love and Lattes
summary: Will you spill the tea about the secret, cozy magical cafe on your college campus? Brew potions and romance on coffee dates with your new friends! A text-based novel of magic and romance, with hundreds of choices and without graphics or sound effects.

name: Willy's Adventure
summary: Join Willy in Willyâ€™s Adventure, a fast-paced retro platformer packed with action and charm! Dash through a perilous castle, brave the icy snow fields, and face off against a fearsome boss in an epic final showdown. Armed with your trusty blaster and rocket-powered double jump, youâ€™ll shoot, slide, and soar past monsters, spiders, and deadly traps in vibrant pixel worlds. With classic arcade energy and tight controls, Willyâ€™s Adventure delivers the perfect blend of nostalgia and challenge â€” are you ready to conquer them all?

name: Within Lattice
summary: Within Lattice is a 2D logic puzzle game where you swap chunks of tiles in a grid to reach the objective.

name: Wither
summary: Wander the halls of an eerie 1920s mansion as haunting visions torment you and the line between reality and nightmare begins to blur. Step into the role of grieving widow Eleanor Hartfield and uncover the chilling truth behind your husband's mysterious death.

name: WishBreaker
summary: A genre-fusion ARPG. Every class plays differently, Warrior plays as Hack n' Slash, Rogue as Stealth rougelike, Cleric is decision based, Druids play creature collecting/farming, Wizards are puzzles, secrets, and code casting and many more! PVE and PVP including Bullet Hell and Soulslike areas!

name: Wizard Duel
summary: Forget dusty spellbooks and charming enchantments. Angdemel: Wizard Duel throws arcane mastery into the brutal arena of high-stakes kombat! This is where legendary figures shed their storybook personas and unleash raw, untamed power in visceral 1v1 duels.

name: Within
summary: Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of a first-person thriller. You will face a cunning criminal. Explore locations, solve puzzles, and try to escape the nightmare. But be careful: you can become not only the hunter but also the prey.

name: Wilderness
summary: This game transports you into a vibrant world where numerous players transform into little snakes competing to grow on an expansive map.

name: Witz
summary:
Are you ready to guess, answer, compete, and prove your worth? WITZ puts you in the center of an arena filled with multiple-choice questions, unlockable themes, collectible avatars, and weekly leagues where every answer counts. New questions and answers are constantly added.

With fast-paced and dynamic modes, you can choose to challenge friends in head-to-head matches, join games against random players from around the world, or enter Arena Mode, where everyone gets the same questions and only the fastest and most accurate wins.

name: Wilder World: Super Early Access
summary: Interdimensional refugees known as the Wilders flee Our Base Reality, which has become an AI-controlled dystopia to Wiami, a digital sanctuary in Wilder World. When the authoritarian FORUM attempts to conquer Wiami, the Wilders strategize a defence.

name: Witchy Tower
summary: A witchy arcade platformer about climbing an infinite tower and avoiding the consequences of your actions.

name: Within These Four Walls
summary: "You are not alone. But maybe you never were." Can you hear the voices too? The sounds? Or am I alone within these four walls? Take on the shoes of a trapped man, roam to find a way out. Maybe you will find some secrets too. But remember to ask yourself who the parasite truly is. You wouldn't want someone snapping your neck from behind.

name: Wild Terra 2: New Lands - Cultist Pack
summary:
Cultist Pack:

Cultâ€™s mounted rat [Skin].
Cult Priest Pet.
Cultist Mask [Skin].
Wings of Cthulhu. Back decoration [Skin].
Cultist's Altar [Bed Skin].
Decorative building Cultist's lamp post.
Title "Cultist".
Character portraits and frame.

name: Wielders of the Essence
summary: Defeat endless hordes in this intense survivors-like. Rally your troops, ready your weapons, and harness the magic of Essence!

name: Wiped Clean PC
summary: Wiped Clean PC is a psychological horror game where you are an undercover agent tasked with cleaning crime scenes while secretly gathering evidence to expose a ruthless hitman.

name: Wiz Quest: Crystal Power
summary: Wiz Quest: Crystal Power is a retro-style action survival game where you control a young wizard facing relentless waves of monsters. Defeat enemies, collect magic crystals, and unlock new powers to enhance your attacks. Each run is a new challenge â€” test your reflexes, master your magic, and see how long you can survive!

name: Winds of Valen
summary: Winds of Valen is a free-to-play MMORPG that embraces traditional progression mechanics in a fantasy open world. Players develop their characters through skill-based advancement in areas like combat, mining, and smithing, while exploring a seamless environment filled with rare loot and resource gathering opportunities. The game focuses on earned achievements rather than microtransactions, following the design philosophy of classic MMORPGs.

name: Wizards & Summons
summary: Among wizards, various things come into vogue and then fade away. "Wizards & Summons" is one of them. An orthodox single-player card game with simple controls! There are over 400 types of cards available!

name: Wild Russia
summary: Â«Wild RussiaÂ» is an open-world horror adventure game. Its action takes place in a striking provincial Russia, and any of your actions or inaction can lead to serious consequences.

name: Within His View
summary: An observation horror where cameras keep you aliveâ€”until they kill you. Hunt anomalies, guard your sanity, and survive a night with the Wendigo stalking behind you.

name: Wise Guys
summary: Wise Guys is a ruthless, high-stakes social deduction game where trust is a weapon and betrayal is just survival. Up to 8 players race against time to clean up their criminal operation and get out before the raid hits. Meanwhile, a Rat is quietly sabotaging the crew at every turn.

name: Windrose
summary: Windrose is a survival adventure in the Age of Piracy. Explore procedural open world, gather, build and craft. Overcome challenging bosses in soulslite combat. Sail your ship, fight on land and sea, play solo or with friends.

name: Winx Club: The Magic Is Back
summary: Winx Club: The Magic is Back captures the essence of the Winx universe, delivering an enchanting experience with a mix of magical combat and puzzle-solving. Play as all six members of the Winx Club, each with their own magical abilities.

name: Without a Hitch
summary: Without a Hitch is a co-op delivery game where you collect and transport cargo across a chaotic and perilous landscape. Whether traveling solo or in a convoy of 2 to 4 players, the package must arrive before the sun sets, and THEY come for it. Can you make it Without a Hitch?

name: Wiznwar Pinball Bundle
summary: The WIZNWAR PINBALL Bundle includes two pinball games. DEMON'S TILT is a video pinball game that incorporates shoot 'em up and hack-and-slash mechanics, featuring enhanced sprites, enemies, secrets, and bullet patterns that push beyond traditional pinball gameplay. XENOTILT is the sequel that continues the pinball fantasy formula with intense gameplay and visual presentation, building upon the cult classic foundation established by its predecessor.

name: Wild Cosmos
summary: You crashed into an unknown asteroid belt. Explore this alien world, leap between asteroids and find a way to repair your spaceship.

name: Within of Static: Ashburg Rental
summary: Riley Adams moves to Ashburg for a new teaching job and rents a house to get settled. She expected silence. She didnâ€™t expect company.

name: WilderLands
summary: WilderLands is a prototype for a planet-scale sandbox showing the custom isocahedral/tetrahedral terrain engine.

name: Wisdom Tower
summary: A Retro Metroidvania focused heavily on Exploration, Puzzle Solving Combat and Platforming.

name: William's Wideblock
summary: A simple and sharp puzzle game. With a wide array of shapes. Stack the blocks neatly to fill the play space and clear blocks horizontally, or choose when to utilize an ability to clear blocks vertically. Any form of block clearing progresses the game and further accelerates the pace!

name: Wings of Vi 2: Guardian's Heart
summary: Myougi survived. She shattered the sin statues. Now the Seven Deadly Sins walk the shattered realms, and Vi returns, wings reforged, to hunt them down. The vision is a mix of what I've learned: a precision platformer with fast, fluid combat and more player agency.

name: Wibbly's Treasure Hunt
summary: Wibbly requires you to embark on a brand new 3D platforming adventure filled with excitement and terror! Collect the required objects needed for Wibbly's own resurrection! Nothing could possibly go wrong!

name: Witch's Lounge
summary: Welcome to the witchesâ€™ stage, Witchâ€™s Lounge! Complete magic circles to the rhythm of the music and cast helpful spells for the people. A charming stage awaits, where cute witches and music come together.

name: Witchland: Trinity Blight
summary: A grim tactical roguelite set on a dying frontier. Master dual combat styles, shape unique builds through powerful tokens, and lead a small band of heroes across lethal hex-grid battles as the world decays toward its final 28th day.

name: Witchlight Woods
summary: Blending fairy tale fright with psychological horror, this narrative game challenges you to survive a weird journey through the woods while being hunted by the witch you were tasked with imprisoning. Sometimes charming, sometimes frightening, sheâ€™ll force you to make hard choices.

name: Wizards in the Woods
summary: An online co-op adventure game where you and your wizard buddies cast spells using symbols and your voice to ward off the creatures lurking in the fog. Stay together as you navigate and deliver the magic orb that can cure this land of the cursed god plaguing it.

name: Wicked West
summary: Survive the unforgiving frontier in Wicked West, a top-down shoot 'em up where every kill earns upgrades and new abilities. Face relentless enemies, epic bosses, and one-shot death in this brutal Wild West survival challenge. Can you outlast the chaos?

name: Wireworks
summary: Wireworks is a base-defense roguelike auto-battler where your defenses are built and controlled using a module board.

name: With Walker
summary: With Walker is a game made using RPG Maker 2000 created by FLARE. The fan-translation into English by rm2Kfanboy in called "Romancing Walker". The story is a combination of a traditional roleplaying game and a dating sim, and draws heavily on the harem genre.

name: Witchling Grove
summary: Witchling Grove is an action-rpg, arena-shooting roguelike.

name: Wild Island
summary: Wild Island is a synergy-focused top-down roguelike about building power over time. Collect accessories, experiment with combinations, and turn careful exploration into overwhelming strength as you rebuild your Sanctuary and face an ever-changing island.

name: Withermoore Castle
summary: Play as Graham, an insomniac trying to find a place where he can finally find some rest. However, he will soon discover that Withermoore Castle is not that place...

name: Wiz Hunter
summary: Wiz Hunter is a rogue-lite deckbuilding card game. Embark on a deadly quest to hunt down wizards through strategic, turn-based combat. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

name: WindStop Strategy
summary: The young master of Hu Yan Men, SITU's peaceful life has been overturned, by a sudden massacre. The Windstop Strategy is a region-suppressing strategy RPG.As the new leader of Hu Yan Men, can you bring glory back and dominate the Windstop Valley?

name: Wish Of Hers
summary:
Wish of Hers is a round-based 2.5D roguelike about surviving in unstable dreams.
Each run is shaped by unlocked abilities, combined aspects, and your decisions.
Experiment, adapt, and break your own builds!

name: Wicked Boy
summary: A nostalgic 2D platformer bursting with Game Boy charm. Combine inventive spells to survive perilous foes, solve clever challenges, and uncover secrets. Lo-fi visuals collide with an epic modern soundtrack, crisp hi-fi SFX and fluid controls, all while keeping the classic spirit of Mario & Mega Man.

name: Wingsuit: Romsdalen
summary: Feel the rush of Norwayâ€™s Romsdalen Valley in this intense action sports game. Pilot a high-performance wingsuit through challenging exits, daring stunts and vast mountain landscapes. Are you ready to hit the slopes?

name: Wishing Well Hotel
summary: Wishing Well Hotel is a visual novel comedy game centered around a hotel full of mysterious suspects with some light minigames intertwined within it. Your objective is to discover the true mastermind behind this mystery and this hotel's weird collection of guests.

name: Wittengrad Is No More
summary: Wittengrad Is No More is a surreal, narrative walking sim with horror elements. The city's foggy streets will lead you through the story of a single evening in Barnabaâ€™s life. You will encounter the peculiar inhabitants of Wittengrad, thoughâ€¦ does it even matter? After all, Wittengrad is gone.

name: Wizard Pool
summary: Pool, but each ball is enchanted! Master the 7 different magical effects, but don't forget your fundamentals!

name: Wizard Blaster
summary: Wizard Blaster is a top-down time survival roguelite where you play as a wizard. Use magic to fight off hordes of evil. Choose from different characters and abilities to survive.

name: Wizard Critter 64
summary: This is a basic wave-based twin-stick shmup, you must protect your [TBD] from the waves of enemies!
